title: ↩️ Right Arrow Curving Left
description: An arrow pointing to the left, with a curved hook at the other end. Similar in appearance to a sideways U Turn symbol, or a reply icon in an email application.

title: 🐫 Two-Hump Camel
description: A camel with two humps found primarily in Central Asia. Much rarer than the single-hump Dromedary Camel.

title: 🦛 Hippopotamus
description: Hippopotamus was approved as part of Unicode 11.0 in 2018 and added to Emoji 11.0 in 2018.

title: 🍭 Lollipop
description: A colorful swirl of hard candy on a stick, called a lollipop. Color varies widely by platform: Google displays rainbow colors, Android shades of pink, and Samsung a candy-cane-colored pinwheel.

title: 🙅‍♀️ Woman Gesturing No
description: A woman with arms crossed forming an ‘X’ to indicate ‘no’ or ‘no good’. This motion is used on the TV game show Deal or No Deal to indicate ‘No Deal’. Intended to be gender-neutral but shown as a woman on most platforms.

title: 🇩🇪 Flag: Germany
description: The flag for Germany, which may show as the letters DE on some platforms

title: 👩‍⚖️ Woman Judge
description: The Woman Judge emoji is a sequence of the 👩 Woman and ⚖ Scales emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 💀 Skull
description: A whitish-gray, cartoon-styled human skull with large, black eye sockets. Commonly expresses figurative death, e.g., dying from extreme laughter, frustration, or affection.

title: 👔 Necktie
description: A necktie commonly worn at work or formal occasions.

title: 🏗️ Building Construction
description: A construction site generally depicted as a tower crane shown lifting steel or other building materials.

title: 💄 Lipstick
description: Lipstick shown with the lid removed. Displays in a shade of red on most platforms, except Android which has a pink color.

title: 🌂 Closed Umbrella
description: An umbrella that is closed, likely as a result of collapsing it prior to going indoors.

title: 📈 Chart Increasing
description: A graph showing a red or green trend line increasing over time, as stock prices or revenues. Commonly used to represent various types of increase, from numerical data to being metaphorically on the rise. May also represent trending content as well as facts, figures, and charts more generally.

title: 🔍 Magnifying Glass Tilted Left
description: A classic magnifying glass, as used to view small objects, with its lens pointed left. Generally depicted at a 45° angle with a black handle and a clear or blue, silver-framed lens titled to the upper left.

title: 🎋 Tanabata Tree
description: A tree that people use to attach pieces of paper containing good wishes. Often done for spiritual or religious reasons, in many cultures.

title: 🐤 Baby Chick
description: A small, yellow, baby chick (chicken).

title: 👩‍👧‍👧 Family: Woman, Girl, Girl
description: The Family: Woman, Girl, Girl emoji is a sequence of the 👩 Woman, 👧 Girl and 👧 Girl emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🍕 Pizza
description: A slice of pepperoni pizza, topped with black olives on Google. WhatsApp adds green pepper, Samsung white onion.

title: 😜 Winking Face With Tongue
description: A yellow face sticking out its tongue and making a zany wink, usually shown with its right eye closed and left wide open. Often conveys a sense of fun, excitement, wackiness, buffoonery, or joking.

title: 🚩 Triangular Flag
description: A triangular red flag on a post. Most commonly associated with golf, as shown in the flag in hole emoji.

title: 🤵 Man in Tuxedo
description: A man dressed for a formal occassion, wearing a tuxedo. This emoji may be used as the gender pair for the bride emoji.

title: 🍽️ Fork and Knife With Plate
description: A silver fork and knife on either side of a white plate, as set for dinner or another meal. Often used more generally for eating and dining. May be paired with Spoon.

title: 🇯🇵 Flag: Japan
description: The flag for Japan, which may show as the letters JP on some platforms.

title: 👝 Clutch Bag
description: A small pouch, somewhere between the size of a handbag, and a purse.

title: 🌧️ Cloud With Rain
description: Raindrops falling from a cloud. People standing under it should probably use an umbrella to keep dry.

title: 🧽 Sponge
description: A peanut-shaped sponge, as used for cleaning or bathing. Generally depicted in yellow and at different angles across platforms. Commonly used for various content concerning bathing, washing, and cleaning.

title: 👩‍✈️ Woman Pilot
description: The Woman Pilot emoji is a sequence of the 👩 Woman and ✈ Airplane emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🍖 Meat on Bone
description: A hunk of unspecified meat on a white bone, as associated with cartoon cavepersons or food in anime and manga (Japanese ano niku, “that meat”).

title: 🧣 Scarf
description: Scarf was approved as part of Unicode 10.0 in 2017 and added to Emoji 5.0 in 2017.

title: 🖌️ Paintbrush
description: A thin, artist's paintbrush, as used to paint a picture. Often depicted with reddish paint on its pointed bristles. Positioned at a 45° angle, its tip at the lower left.

title: 🇳🇬 Flag: Nigeria
description: The flag for Nigeria, which may show as the letters NG on some platforms.

title: 🗑️ Wastebasket
description: A wastebasket, as used to discard trash in an office. Generally depicted as a silver, wire-mesh container. Also known as a wastepaper basket, trash/garbage can, or rubbish bin.

title: 🍎 Red Apple
description: A classic red apple, shown with a stem and single, green leaf on major platforms. Commonly associated with doctors, teachers, and New York.

title: 🦍 Gorilla
description: A gorilla, displayed either as the entire animal, or just the face.

title: 🐈 Cat
description: A domestic house cat, shown facing left-of-screen on all major platforms. Distinct from the cat face emoji, this cat emoji shows the full body of the animal including the tail, which is generally upright.

title: 🎧 Headphone
description: Headphones, used to listen to music or other forms audio, such as podcasts. Most platforms display this emoji with large over-ear headphones in shades of black, blue, and gray.

title: 🇦🇿 Flag: Azerbaijan
description: The flag for Azerbaijan, which may show as the letters AZ on some platforms.

title: 🧛 Vampire
description: A vampire shown wearing a dark cape, and with pointed fangs. This emoji supports skin tones, and variations that are female or male.

title: 🦏 Rhinoceros
description: A rhinoceros, displayed either as the entire animal, or just the face.

title: 🔰 Japanese Symbol for Beginner
description: A yellow and green shield symbol, called a Shoshinsha Mark. Must be displayed by drivers in Japan for one year after they receive their drivers licence.

title: 👨 Man
description: A man of adult age, shown on some platforms with a moustache.

title: 🕶️ Sunglasses
description: Sunglasses that can be worn outside for protection from the sun. Often association with connotations of being "cool", or leisurely in sunny places.

title: 🎣 Fishing Pole
description: A fishing rod (pole) with a fish caught on the end.

title: 🐜 Ant
description: A small, black ant shown with three to eight legs depending on platform vendor. Display colors include black, grey, and red.

title: 😶 Face Without Mouth
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and no mouth, as if at a loss for words. Meaning widely varies, but commonly conveys speechlessness, humility, and silence. May also convey moderately negative emotions, such as disappointment, frustration, or sadness.

title: ⛎ Ophiuchus
description: Ophiuchus is used by some as a 13th sign in the Zodiac. The symbol for ophiuchus appears a U shape with a wavy line through it.

title: 🥺 Pleading Face
description: A yellow face with furrowed eyebrows, a small frown, and large, “puppy dog” eyes, as if begging or pleading. May also represent adoration or feeling touched by a loving gesture.

title: 🇹🇩 Flag: Chad
description: The flag for Chad, which may show as the letters TD on some platforms.

title: 👲 Man With Chinese Cap
description: A man wearing a gua pi mao; a type of Chinese hat. Sometimes referred to as a skullcap.

title: 🧜‍♂️ Merman
description: The Merman emoji is a sequence of the 🧜 Merperson and ♂ Male Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 👆 Backhand Index Pointing Up
description: Index finger pointing upward, showing the back of the hand while doing so.

title: 🇧🇭 Flag: Bahrain
description: The flag for Bahrain, which may show as the letters BH on some platforms.

title: 🇦🇱 Flag: Albania
description: The flag for Albania, which may show as the letters AL on some platforms.

title: 🏴 Black Flag
description: Black Flag was approved as part of Unicode 7.0 in 2014 under the name “Waving Black Flag” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: ➡️ Right Arrow
description: An arrow, pointing right.

title: ↗️ Up-Right Arrow
description: An arrow pointing diagonally in an up-right, or north-east direction.

title: 🤹 Person Juggling
description: A person juggling between three and five colored balls. The person shown in this emoji generally has the appearance of a man, and wears a hat on most major platforms.

title: 😐 Neutral Face
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and a flat, closed mouth. Intended to depict a neutral sentiment but often used to convey mild irritation and concern or a deadpan sense of humor.

title: 🏒 Ice Hockey
description: A hockey stick and puck, used in the sport of ice hockey. Not to be confused with the field hockey stick and ball.

title: 🇺🇾 Flag: Uruguay
description: The flag for Uruguay, which may show as the letters UY on some platforms.

title: 🎌 Crossed Flags
description: Two Japanese Flags, crossed at the base. Except on some Samsung devices, which have previously displayed two South Korean flags.

title: 👩‍👩‍👧‍👧 Family: Woman, Woman, Girl, Girl
description: A family with two mothers, and two daughters.

title: 🇺🇿 Flag: Uzbekistan
description: The flag for Uzbekistan, which may show as the letters UZ on some platforms.

title: 🦋 Butterfly
description: A butterfly shown with wings spread. Commonly displayed as a Monarch Butterfly (with orange and black wings) or a Morpho Butterfly (with blue and black wings).

title: 👑 Crown
description: A gold crown with jewels on the sides. Representative of a King, Queen, or other form of Royalty.

title: 🍵 Teacup Without Handle
description: A cup of green tea, as the minty-colored Japanese matcha, usually shown on a wooden mat. Matcha is traditionally served in a small bowl that resembles a cup without a handle. Often taken as a bowl of soup, such as a split pea.

title: 🛡️ Shield
description: A shield, as blocks swords in close combat. Color and style varies across platforms, but generally depicted in a kite shape with a metal border and simple pattern.

title: 🚍 Oncoming Bus
description: The front of a bus, showing the windscreen, as well as wing mirrors in some versions of this emoji.

title: 🖥️ Desktop Computer
description: A desktop personal computer. Generally depicted as a black or gray monitor with a dark or blue screen.

title: 👸 Princess
description: The face of a princess; a girl or woman wearing a small crown or tiara. Could also be used to represent a Queen or other royalty.

title: ↕️ Up-Down Arrow
description: A vertical line with arrowheads on both ends, pointing up and down.

title: 📁 File Folder
description: A tabbed folder, as used to file papers in a cabinet or as an icon for a file on a computer. Most platforms depict a yellow folder, as manila, with the tab shown at the left.

title: 🤍 White Heart
description: A white heart emoji to accompany other hearts such as ❤️🧡💛💚💙💜🖤 approved as part of Emoji 12.0 in 2019. A popular request, and coming to major platforms throughout 2019.

title: ⛸️ Ice Skate
description: A single ice skate used for ice skating. Shown in white and facing left on most platforms.

title: 🇸🇴 Flag: Somalia
description: The flag for Somalia, which may show as the letters SO on some platforms.

title: 🔩 Nut and Bolt
description: A metal bolt with a nut threaded around it, as by a wrench. Often positioned at a 45° angle, the head of the bolt at the upper left. Commonly used for various content concerning tools, building, and construction. May also be used for other hardware, including screws.

title: 👩‍❤️‍👩 Couple With Heart: Woman, Woman
description: Two women standing next to each other, smiling, with a pink love heart floating in the air between them.

title: ⛹️ Person Bouncing Ball
description: A person with a ball, which is generally displayed as a basketballer running and dribbling (bouncing) the basketball.

title: ☑️ Ballot Box With Check
description: A checkbox showing a check mark inside the box. Not to be confused with the similarly named Ballot Box With Ballot emoji.

title: 👩‍🦳 Woman: White Hair
description: The Woman: White Hair emoji is a sequence of the 👩 Woman and 🦳 Emoji Component White Hair emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🇹🇿 Flag: Tanzania
description: The flag for Tanzania, which may show as the letters TZ on some platforms.

title: 🥇 1st Place Medal
description: 1st Place Medal was approved as part of Unicode 9.0 in 2016 under the name “First Place Medal” and added to Emoji 3.0 in 2016.

title: 🔎 Magnifying Glass Tilted Right
description: A classic magnifying glass, as used to view small objects, with its lens pointed right. Generally depicted at a 45° angle with a black handle and a clear or blue, silver-framed lens titled to the upper right.

title: 🇬🇹 Flag: Guatemala
description: The flag for Guatemala, which may show as the letters GT on some platforms.

title: 👱‍♀️ Woman: Blond Hair
description: The female version of the 👱 Person With Blond Hair emoji.

title: 🧳 Luggage
description: A suitcase or bag, as used for traveling. Most platforms depict gray or blue rolling luggage with an extended handle. Commonly used for various content concerning traveling or taking trips, whether for business or leisure.

title: 👨‍👦 Family: Man, Boy
description: The Family: Man, Boy emoji is a sequence of the 👨 Man and 👦 Boy emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: ⚒️ Hammer and Pick
description: A hammer and pick, as used for breaking up rocks in mining, crossed in an X shape. Generally depicted as metal, mallet- and chisel-styled hammers with wooden handles. The heads of the tools face up, with the pick usually at the right. Often used for various content concerning tools, building, and construction.

title: ✌️ Victory Hand
description: Most commonly known as a ✌️ Peace Sign, but traditionally called as a Victory Hand. Two fingers held up on one hand making a V sign.

title: 🧴 Lotion Bottle
description: A bottle of lotion for the skin, such as moisturizer or sunscreen (sunblock). May be used for other hygienic liquids, including shampoo and body wash, as well as beauty products.

title: 🇮🇪 Flag: Ireland
description: The flag for Ireland, which may show as the letters IE on some platforms.

title: 🇱🇰 Flag: Sri Lanka
description: The flag for Sri Lanka, which may show as the letters LK on some platforms.

title: 📳 Vibration Mode
description: An icon representing vibration mode on a mobile phone, indicating that a phone should be switched to silent and/or vibrate mode.

title: 🍐 Pear
description: A light-green variety of a common pear, shown with a stem and sometimes green leaf.

title: 🤳 Selfie
description: A mobile phone held up to take a selfie (photo of the person holding the phone or camera). Generally represented as a disembodied arm holding a mobile phone.

title: 🗺️ World Map
description: A rectangular map of the world. Generally depicted as a paper map creased at its folds, Earth’s surface shown in green on blue ocean.

title: 🛥️ Motor Boat
description: Motor Boat was approved as part of Unicode 7.0 in 2014 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🙆‍♀️ Woman Gesturing OK
description: The female version of the 🙆 Face With OK Gesture emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.

title: 🙌 Raising Hands
description: Two hands raised in the air, celebrating success or another joyous event.

title: 🇸🇭 Flag: St. Helena
description: The flag for St. Helena, which may show as the letters SH on some platforms. This same flag is used for Ascension Island and Tristan Da Cunha.

title: 🚬 Cigarette
description: A lit, filtered cigarette, shown burning at different directions. Commonly used to represent various forms of smoking (e.g., tobacco, marijuana, vaping) as well as metaphorical senses of smoking.

title: 👯‍♂️ Men With Bunny Ears
description: The male version of the 👯 Woman With Bunny Ears emoji.

title: 🇲🇪 Flag: Montenegro
description: The flag for Montenegro, which may show as the letters ME on some platforms

title: 🧂 Salt
description: A clear glass shaker of salt with a silver cap, as paired with pepper to season food when eating at a restaurant.

title: 👯‍♀️ Women With Bunny Ears
description: The female version of the 👯 Woman With Bunny Ears emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.

title: 🥪 Sandwich
description: A sandwich, as eaten at lunch, made with lettuce, tomato, and cheese on slices of white or wheat bread. Apple, Google, and WhatsApp add a deli meat that resembles ham.

title: 🇨🇨 Flag: Cocos (Keeling) Islands
description: The Flag: Cocos (Keeling) Islands emoji is a sequence of the 🇨 Regional Indicator Symbol Letter C and 🇨 Regional Indicator Symbol Letter C emojis. These display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🍓 Strawberry
description: The fruit of a rich red strawberry dotted with seeds and crowned with green leaves. Google previously depicted the fruit in orange.

title: 🐥 Front-Facing Baby Chick
description: A baby chicken (chick), facing forward.

title: 🎡 Ferris Wheel
description: A large rotating wheel, often found at a carnival or fair.

title: 🧖‍♂️ Man in Steamy Room
description: The Man in Steamy Room emoji is a sequence of the 🧖 Person in Steamy Room and ♂ Male Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🥌 Curling Stone
description: Curling Stone was approved as part of Unicode 10.0 in 2017 and added to Emoji 5.0 in 2017.

title: 🦝 Raccoon
description: Raccoon was approved as part of Unicode 11.0 in 2018 and added to Emoji 11.0 in 2018.

title: 🦄 Unicorn Face
description: A mythical creature generally depicted as a white horse, with a long horn. Also available as an Animoji on iOS.

title: ⛱️ Umbrella on Ground
description: A large, open umbrella, as provides shade at a beach or patio. Generally depicted as a striped umbrella inserted into a patch of sand and tilted to the right.

title: 😡 Pouting Face
description: A red face with an angry expression: frowning mouth with eyes and eyebrows scrunched downward. Bears the same expression as 😠 Angry Face on most platforms and may convey more intense degrees of anger, e.g., hate or rage.

title: 🇹🇯 Flag: Tajikistan
description: The flag for Tajikistan, which may show as the letters TJ on some platforms.

title: ⏪ Fast Reverse Button
description: Two triangles pointing to the left. Most commonly used as a symbol for rewinding media such as video tapes, CDs, or digital audio and video.

title: 🏴󠁵󠁳󠁴󠁸󠁿 Flag for Texas (US-TX)
description: The Flag for Texas (US-TX) emoji is a sequence of the 🏴 Waving Black Flag, 󠁵 Tag Latin Small Letter U, 󠁳 Tag Latin Small Letter S, 󠁴 Tag Latin Small Letter T, 󠁸 Tag Latin Small Letter X and 󠁿 Cancel Tag emojis. These display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🔺 Red Triangle Pointed Up
description: Red Triangle Pointed Up was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name “Up-Pointing Red Triangle” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🇸🇨 Flag: Seychelles
description: The flag for Seychelles, which may show as the letters SC on some platforms.

title: ⭕ Heavy Large Circle
description: Used as an alternative to a check (tick) in Japan for a something that is correct. The opposite of an X (cross mark) for something wrong.

title: 🇩🇿 Flag: Algeria
description: The flag for Algeria, which may show as the letters DZ on some platforms.

title: 🏰 Castle
description: A castle, in a style that can be found in France and other parts of Europe.

title: 🌲 Evergreen Tree
description: A type tree found in nature that doesn’t lose its leaves seasonally, but stays green all year around.

title: 🧺 Basket
description: A basket, as used for storing or carrying such things as food or clothes. Appearance widely varies across platforms but generally depicted as woven from wicker with one or more handles. Commonly used to represent doing laundry or having a picnic.

title: 😨 Fearful Face
description: A face with small, open eyes, open frown, raised eyebrows, and a pale blue forehead, as if experiencing a cold flash. Samsung’s design shows upper teeth and tongue.

title: 👨‍👩‍👧‍👧 Family: Man, Woman, Girl, Girl
description: A family with a father, mother, and two daughters.

title: 🥉 3rd Place Medal
description: 3rd Place Medal was approved as part of Unicode 9.0 in 2016 under the name “Third Place Medal” and added to Emoji 3.0 in 2016.

title: 📿 Prayer Beads
description: A string of beads, as used in prayer or meditation in many religious traditions. Generally depicted as red, wooden beads with a gold, decorative center bead and tassel.

title: ⛈️ Cloud With Lightning and Rain
description: Cloud With Lightning and Rain was approved as part of Unicode 5.2 in 2009 under the name “Thunder Cloud and Rain” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 😃 Grinning Face With Big Eyes
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and a broad, open smile, showing upper teeth and tongue on some platforms. Often conveys general happiness and good-natured amusement.

title: 🇭🇳 Flag: Honduras
description: The flag for Honduras, which may show as the letters HN on some platforms.

title: 👿 Angry Face With Horns
description: A face, usually purple, with two devil horns, frowning mouth and eyes, and eyebrows scrunched downwards in anger. Bears the same expression as 😠 Angry Face and 😡 Pouting Face on most platforms. Google’s design is red and Facebook’s has black horns, green eyes, and clenched teeth.

title: 🍳 Cooking
description: An egg with yolk frying in a skillet, as prepared sunny-side up. Though associated with breakfast, the emoji represents the general action of cooking and related concepts.

title: 🥑 Avocado
description: A pear-shaped avocado, sliced in half to show its yellow-green flesh and large brown pit. Ready for toast, guacamole, or millennial jokes.

title: 📍 Round Pushpin
description: A pushpin, as used to indicate a location on a map. Generally depicted as an upright pin with a red, round head.

title: 🌵 Cactus
description: A cactus emoji, usually found in warm or desert climates. Most commonly displayed as a three-branch Saguaro cactus.

title: 🎎 Japanese Dolls
description: Ornamental Japanese Emperor and Empress dolls, as displayed in celebration of Hinamatsuri on March 3 in Japan (Girls’ or Dolls’ Day).

title: 🎊 Confetti Ball
description: A golden ball, split in two halves in a shower of multicolored confetti and streamers.

title: 🉐 Japanese “Bargain” Button
description: Denotes a “good bargain” in Japanese.

title: 🍤 Fried Shrimp
description: A prawn or shrimp breaded and deep-fried golden-brown. Known as ebi furai in Japan but commonly called shrimp tempura and served in a bento box. Not to be confused with the Shrimp.

title: 🇺🇳 Flag: United Nations
description: The flag for United Nations. May show as the letters UN. This two letter regional indicator pair is an exceptional reservation as part of ISO 3166.

title: 🇨🇳 Flag: China
description: The flag for China, which may show as the letters CN on some platforms.

title: 👩‍🔧 Woman Mechanic
description: The Woman Mechanic emoji is a sequence of the 👩 Woman and 🔧 Wrench emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🇷🇼 Flag: Rwanda
description: The flag for Rwanda, which may show as the letters RW on some platforms.

title: 🦀 Crab
description: A crab shown from above, with claws. Commonly used in relation to eating crab as seafood, and may be used in relation to the zodiac symbol for cancer.

title: 🇬🇷 Flag: Greece
description: The flag for Greece, which may show as the letters GR on some platforms.

title: 🗄️ File Cabinet
description: A metal filing cabinet, as used to organize and store file folders at an office. Depicted in black or gray with two drawers, handles, and label holders.

title: 🧜‍♀️ Mermaid
description: The Mermaid emoji is a sequence of the 🧜 Merperson and ♀ Female Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🇰🇮 Flag: Kiribati
description: The flag for Kiribati, which may show as the letters KI on some platforms.

title: 🔗 Link
description: Two links of a silver chain, positioned at a 45° angle. Used as an icon for a hyperlink on computers and the internet. May also be used for metaphorical connections.

title: 🙋‍♂️ Man Raising Hand
description: The man version of the 🙋 Happy Person Raising One Hand emoji.

title: 🌚 New Moon Face
description: A moon with a face, hiding in shadow. Sometimes perceived to be creepy, this is a regular new moon, with a face on it.

title: 🇧🇸 Flag: Bahamas
description: The flag for Bahamas, which may show as the letters BS on some platforms.

title: 👉 Backhand Index Pointing Right
description: Index finger pointing to the right.

title: 🇸🇱 Flag: Sierra Leone
description: The flag for Sierra Leone, which may show as the letters SL on some platforms.

title: 🚜 Tractor
description: A tractor, may be used by a farmer or other occupation on the land.

title: 🐖 Pig
description: A domestic pig, whose ancestor is the wild boar. This farm animal is shown in a pink color and faces right-to-left on most platforms. Previously had a large grin on WhatsApp.

title: 🎈 Balloon
description: A balloon on a string, as decorates a birthday party. Generally depicted in red, though WhatsApp’s is pink and Google’s orangish-red.

title: 🇦🇸 Flag: American Samoa
description: The flag for American Samoa, which may show as the letters AS on some platforms.

title: 🔨 Hammer
description: A claw hammer, as used for driving or removing nails. Generally depicted with a metal head and wooden handle, positioned at a 45° angle with the head at the upper left.

title: 🇹🇻 Flag: Tuvalu
description: The flag for Tuvalu, which may show as the letters TV on some platforms.

title: 🤦‍♂️ Man Facepalming
description: The Man Facepalming emoji is a sequence of the 🤦 Face Palm and ♂ Male Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 💭 Thought Balloon
description: A large cloud-like shape more commonly known as a thought bubble.

title: ⬆️ Up Arrow
description: An arrow, pointing up.

title: 💔 Broken Heart
description: A love heart, broken in two. This emoji represents the aching one feels when they are missing the  person they love.

title: 👩‍🎓 Woman Student
description: The Woman Student emoji is a sequence of the 👩 Woman and 🎓 Graduation Cap emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🤼‍♀️ Women Wrestling
description: The Women Wrestling emoji is a sequence of the 🤼 Wrestlers and ♀ Female Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: ⚱️ Funeral Urn
description: An urn, as used to hold the cremated ashes of the dead. Appearance varies, but generally depicted as a covered, bronze container with a rounded body and tapered foot.

title: 🛀 Person Taking Bath
description: A gender-unspecified person taking a soothing bath in a white tub with a shower head. Commonly used for various content concerning bathing, washing, cleaning, and bathrooms more generally. May also represent relaxation and self-care.

title: 😪 Sleepy Face
description: A yellow face with closed eyes, mouth slightly open, and a blue snot bubble coming from its nose. Snot bubbles indicate a character is tired or sleeping in anime or manga. Not to be confused with 😴 Sleeping Face

title: 🎽 Running Shirt
description: A singlet or running shirt. Shown with a sash.

title: 🤤 Drooling Face
description: A yellow face, usually shown with closed eyes and raised eyebrows, with saliva drooling from one corner of its mouth. Often used to show desire for a person (sexy, attractive) or object (e.g., delicious food). May also represent someone is tired or sleeping.

title: 📖 Open Book
description: An open, hardcover book, often depicted with a blue cover. Some platforms include a bookmark. Commonly used for various content concerning reading, writing, learning, and schooling.

title: 🤼‍♂️ Men Wrestling
description: The Men Wrestling emoji is a sequence of the 🤼 Wrestlers and ♂ Male Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🚖 Oncoming Taxi
description: A yellow taxicab, iconically seen in New York City. Shown from the front, as opposed to the taxi emoji which displays the side of the vehicle.

title: 🔚 End Arrow
description: End Arrow was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name “End With Leftwards Arrow Above” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 😧 Anguished Face
description: A yellow face with small, open eyes, open frown, and raised eyebrows. Samsung’s design shows upper teeth and tongue. Meaning widely varies, but may convey alarm, confusion, or sadness, as if gasping in shock or concern.

title: 🎁 Wrapped Gift
description: A present or gift in a box tied with a bow, as given on a birthday or Christmas. Box and ribbon color vary across platforms, but commonly depicted as a gold box with a lid wrapped with a red ribbon.

title: ♉ Taurus
description: The Taurus astrological sign in the Zodiac. This Zodiac Symbol represents a Bull.

title: 🇧🇼 Flag: Botswana
description: The flag for Botswana, which may show as the letters BW on some platforms.

title: 🛵 Motor Scooter
description: A motor scooter, which may be displayed as any type of motorbike with or without a step-through frame. Distinct from the racing motorcycle, which is used for sport, not transport.

title: 💟 Heart Decoration
description: A decorative heart that displays on Apple devices as a white heart-shaped cutout in a pink or purple roundrect.

title: 😬 Grimacing Face
description: A yellow face with simple open eyes showing clenched teeth. May represent a range of negative or tense emotions, especially nervousness, embarrassment, or awkwardness (e.g., Eek!).

title: 🇬🇶 Flag: Equatorial Guinea
description: The flag for Equatorial Guinea, which may show as the letters GQ on some platforms.

title: 🉑 Japanese “Acceptable” Button
description: Japanese “Acceptable” Button was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name “Circled Ideograph Accept” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🧻 Roll of Paper
description: A roll of paper, as toilet paper (toilet tissue). May also be a roll of kitchen/paper towels. Depicted at various angles, with a sheet unfurling.

title: 🗡️ Dagger
description: A pointed knife with a steel blade, as used for thrusting in close combat. Generally depicted as double-edged with a brown or black, cross-shaped hilt and positioned at 45° angle, often with its tip at the lower left.

title: 💦 Sweat Droplets
description: Beads of sweat splashing in a single direction. Is not distinguishable from splashing water, and is often used as water instead of sweat.

title: 🇯🇲 Flag: Jamaica
description: The flag for Jamaica, which may show as the letters JM on some platforms.

title: 📎 Paperclip
description: A silver paper clip, as used to hold together sheets of paper—or remove a SIM card from a mobile phone. Shown positioned at various angles.

title: 🤮 Face Vomiting
description: A yellow face with scrunched, X-shaped eyes spewing bright-green vomit. May represent physical illness or disgust, more intensely so than 🤢 Nauseated Face.

title: 🐌 Snail
description: A snail shown with distinctive spiral shell. Differs greatly in color and style across different platforms.

title: 🚣‍♀️ Woman Rowing Boat
description: The female version of the 🚣 Rowboat emoji.

title: 👩‍💻 Woman Technologist
description: A woman behind a computer screen, working in the field of technology.

title: 🕕 Six O’Clock
description: Six O’Clock was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name “Clock Face Six O’Clock” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 👰 Bride With Veil
description: A bride in traditional western wedding dress with a veil on her head. This veil is white for the Apple emoji, pink in the Google emoji and blue in Microsoft’s emoji.

title: 😩 Weary Face
description: A yellow face with closed eyes, furrowed brows, and a broad, open frown, as if distraught to the point of giving up. Usually shown with upper teeth and sometimes tongue.

title: ♻️ Recycling Symbol
description: The universal recycling symbol, featuring three arrows pointing clockwise in a triangular formation.

title: 👁️ Eye
description: A single human eye, looking forward. This eye is in a different shape and style to the pair of eyes, which are more rounded, and looking to one side.

title: 🕓 Four O’Clock
description: Four O’Clock was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name “Clock Face Four O’Clock” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🛏️ Bed
description: A bed, made up for sleeping in a house, hotel, or other sleeping accommodation. Shown with a headboard at the left, footboard, mattress, pillow, and sheet. Most platforms suggest a wooden frame and feature blue or red sheets.

title: ☝️ Index Pointing Up
description: A single finger pointing upward, which could be used to represent the number one, or to ask a question.

title: 🎻 Violin
description: A violin emoji. Sometimes  used in the context of the world’s smallest violin.

title: 🍁 Maple Leaf
description: A red, orange or yellow maple leaf, often associated with Canada due to the maple leaf on the Canadian Flag.

title: 🇱🇮 Flag: Liechtenstein
description: The flag for Liechtenstein, which may show as the letters LI on some platforms.

title: 🧗‍♂️ Man Climbing
description: A male rock climber, shown climbing up a rock formation. Some platforms show the climber with a helmet, and/or rope.

title: 🖐️ Hand With Fingers Splayed
description: A raised hand with a part between each finger and the thumb. Held up in a manner that may indicate the number five. Similar to a waving hand, without any motion.

title: 👨‍👧‍👧 Family: Man, Girl, Girl
description: The Family: Man, Girl, Girl emoji is a sequence of the 👨 Man, 👧 Girl and 👧 Girl emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🚎 Trolleybus
description: A type of bus that uses overhead electrical wires for power. Appears similar to a cross between a bus and a tram car.

title: 🤑 Money-Mouth Face
description: A yellow face with raised eyebrows, dollar signs for eyes, and an open smile sticking out a tongue styled after a green, dollar banknote. Some platforms depict the dollar-sign eyes in green circles.

title: 🦷 Tooth
description: Tooth was approved as part of Unicode 11.0 in 2018 and added to Emoji 11.0 in 2018.

title: 🧞‍♀️ Woman Genie
description: The Woman Genie emoji is a sequence of the 🧞 Genie and ♀ Female Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🇮🇱 Flag: Israel
description: The flag for Israel, which may show as the letters IL on some platforms.

title: 🎖️ Military Medal
description: A ribbon and medallion generally awarded to a person in the military for heroic acts.

title: 🇹🇹 Flag: Trinidad & Tobago
description: The Flag: Trinidad & Tobago emoji is a sequence of the 🇹 Regional Indicator Symbol Letter T and 🇹 Regional Indicator Symbol Letter T emojis. These display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🏊‍♂️ Man Swimming
description: The male version of the 🏊 Swimmer emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.

title: 👨‍🎤 Man Singer
description: A man singer or rock star generally displayed with a microphone, and sometimes musical notes.

title: 🏋️‍♂️ Man Lifting Weights
description: The male version of the 🏋 Weight Lifter emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.

title: 🎂 Birthday Cake
description: A frosted cake with lit candles, as presented for a birthday celebration. The style of cake widely varies across platforms. With white frosting and strawberries, Apple and Google’s designs suggest a Japanese Christmas cake. Other vendors depict a chocolate, pink, and/or sponge cake.

title: 🏈 American Football
description: The oval ball used in the game of American football, known as gridiron in some countries.

title: 👨‍❤️‍💋‍👨 Kiss: Man, Man
description: Two men displayed kissing, or gesturing a kiss toward each other. At small sizes this may be difficult to discern from the two women kissing.

title: 🇳🇷 Flag: Nauru
description: The flag for Nauru, which may show as the letters NR on some platforms.

title: 🏄‍♀️ Woman Surfing
description: The female version of the 🏄 Surfer emoji.

title: 🚵‍♀️ Woman Mountain Biking
description: The female version of the 🚵 Mountain Bicyclist emoji.

title: 🖖 Vulcan Salute
description: A raised hand, with the fingers separated between the ring finger and the middle finger.

title: 🙂 Slightly Smiling Face
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and a thin, closed smile. Conveys a wide range of positive, happy, and friendly sentiments. Its tone can also be patronizing, passive-aggressive, or ironic, as if saying This is fine when it’s really not.

title: 🧟‍♀️ Woman Zombie
description: The Woman Zombie emoji is a sequence of the 🧟 Zombie and ♀ Female Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 💂‍♂️ Man Guard
description: The male version of the 💂 Guardsman emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.

title: ◽ White Medium-Small Square
description: White Medium-Small Square was approved as part of Unicode 3.2 in 2002 under the name “White Medium Small Square” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 📅 Calendar
description: A single date on a calendar. Generally depicted as a page torn off from a daily desk calendar, displaying month (usually abbreviated and in a red or blue header) and day on a white, square page.

title: 🏠 House
description: A house, otherwise known as a home when someone is living in it. Suitable for a couple or larger family, other perhaps housemates.

title: 🙅‍♂️ Man Gesturing No
description: A woman with arms crossed forming an ‘X’ to indicate ‘no’ or ‘no good’. This motion is used on the TV game show Deal or No Deal to indicate ‘No Deal’. Intended to be gender-neutral but shown as a woman on most platforms.

title: 📻 Radio
description: A classic portable radio, as used to listen to music, news, or sports. Depicted in various colors and styles with a speaker, antenna, dial, and knobs.

title: 🇳🇪 Flag: Niger
description: The flag for Niger, which may show as the letters NE on some platforms.

title: 📛 Name Badge
description: A name badge, used to identify oneself in a location that others may not know your name, such as a school trip, or a work conference.

title: 🧙‍♂️ Man Mage
description: The Man Mage emoji is a sequence of the 🧙 Mage and ♂ Male Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🚹 Men’s Room
description: A stick-figure icon of a man, generally used to indicate a male restroom. The female equivalent is the Womens Symbol emoji.

title: 🔅 Dim Button
description: An icon of a outlined sun, used when decreasing the brightness of a screen. Appears smaller than the High Brightness Symbol.

title: 🔖 Bookmark
description: A bookmark, as used to mark one's place in a book. May also represent bookmarks on an internet browser. Appearance varies across platforms, but generally depicted at a 45° angle as a thin, white or red strip with a decorative tie and design, such as flower or star.

title: 🎟️ Admission Tickets
description: A ticket or tickets to an event that may say "Admit One" on the front. Shown in pink or yellow on most platforms.

title: 👨‍👨‍👧‍👧 Family: Man, Man, Girl, Girl
description: A family with two fathers, and two daughters.

title: 🌝 Full Moon Face
description: A smiling full moon, sometimes said to have a slightly creepy face. Not to be confused with the full moon that has no face.

title: 🇫🇴 Flag: Faroe Islands
description: The flag for Faroe Islands, which may show as the letters FO on some platforms.

title: 🧖 Person in Steamy Room
description: A person in a sauna, holding a ladle for pouring water on hot stones, which creates the steamy environment.

title: 😰 Anxious Face With Sweat
description: A face with open eyes and a small, open frown. Its eyebrows are furrowed, with a single bead of cold sweat dripping down, and its forehead is pale blue, as if experiencing a cold flash. Samsung's design shows upper teeth and tongue.

title: ♾️ Infinity
description: An infinity emoji, displayed as the symbol for infinity enclosed within a circle or square.

title: 🙎‍♂️ Man Pouting
description: The male version of the 🙎 Person With Pouting Face emoji.

title: 🇲🇦 Flag: Morocco
description: The flag for Morocco, which may show as the letters MA on some platforms.

title: 😞 Disappointed Face
description: A yellow face with a frown and closed, downcast eyes, as if aching with sorrow or pain. May convey a variety of unhappy emotions, including disappointment, grief, stress, regret, and remorse.

title: ☃️ Snowman
description: A snowman emoji, made out of snow (usually by children) in winter. This emoji is distinct from Snowman Without Snow as this variation features falling snow.

title: 🦕 Sauropod
description: A dinosaur with a long neck, tail, and four thick legs. Common examples include the Brachiosaurus, Diplodocus, and Brontosaurus.

title: ☔ Umbrella With Rain Drops
description: An umbrella with a hooked handle, displayed open with rain drops falling on it. The color of this umbrella varies by platform.

title: 👨‍🎓 Man Student
description: The Man Student emoji is a sequence of the 👨 Man and 🎓 Graduation Cap emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: ✡️ Star of David
description: A symbol often used in relation to the religion of Judaism. Not to be confused with the Six Pointed Star With Middle Dot emoji.

title: 🇪🇪 Flag: Estonia
description: The flag for Estonia, which may show as the letters EE on some platforms.

title: 🤖 Robot Face
description: The head of a classic robot. Commonly depicted as a vintage, tin toy robot with circular eyes, a triangular nose, knobs for ears, a light and/or antennae atop its head, and a grill-like mouth similar to a grimace. Colors vary across platform, but its head is metallic on most platforms.

title: 🎤 Microphone
description: A microphone, used to amplify a person’s voice when speaking or singing. Shown with music notes on most platforms, implying it to be used for a singer / singing.

title: 💪 Flexed Biceps
description: An arm flexing to show its biceps muscle. Represents strength, or working out.

title: 👭 Women Holding Hands
description: Two women holding hands, most likely due to being in a relationship.

title: 🍒 Cherries
description: Two rich red cherries with a green leaf and joined at their long stems.

title: 🌞 Sun With Face
description: A yellow sun with a kind, smiling face. Not your typical smiling sun with big grin and sunglasses.

title: 🏏 Cricket Game
description: A cricket bat, with a cricket ball also shown. May be displayed with a wicket present.

title: 🎼 Musical Score
description: A staff (or stave) showing a treble clef and five horizontal lines.

title: 😏 Smirking Face
description: A yellow face with a sly, smug, mischievous, or suggestive facial expression. It features a half-smile, raised eyebrows, and eyes looking to the side. Often used to convey flirtation or sexual innuendo.

title: 😣 Persevering Face
description: A yellow face with a slight frown, furrowed eyebrows, and scrunched, X-shaped eyes, as if holding back tears or exerting great effort. May convey various degrees and tones of frustration, sadness, helplessness, and struggle. Facebook’s design features a light-purple forehead.

title: 😱 Face Screaming in Fear
description: A yellow face screaming in fear, depicted by wide, white eyes, a long, open mouth, hands pressed on cheeks, and a pale blue forehead, as if it has lost its color. Its expression evokes Edvard Munch’s iconic painting The Scream.

title: 🔪 Kitchen Knife
description: A knife with a long steel blade, as a chef uses to slice meat or vegetables. Depicted with a black or brown handle and positioned at a 45° angle, often with its point at the lower right.

title: 🌇 Sunset
description: A beautiful view, featuring an orange sky, with the sun setting over the buildings of a city skyline.

title: 🧢 Billed Cap
description: Billed Cap was approved as part of Unicode 10.0 in 2017 and added to Emoji 5.0 in 2017.

title: 8️⃣ Keycap Digit Eight
description: The Keycap Digit Eight emoji is a sequence of the 8 Digit Eight and ⃣ Combining Enclosing Keycap emojis. These display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 6️⃣ Keycap Digit Six
description: The Keycap Digit Six emoji is a sequence of the 6 Digit Six and ⃣ Combining Enclosing Keycap emojis. These display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🙈 See-No-Evil Monkey
description: One of the three wise monkeys, known as Mizaru.

title: 9️⃣ Keycap Digit Nine
description: The Keycap Digit Nine emoji is a sequence of the 9 Digit Nine and ⃣ Combining Enclosing Keycap emojis. These display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 👨‍🎨 Man Artist
description: The Man Artist emoji is a sequence of the 👨 Man and 🎨 Artist Palette emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 📜 Scroll
description: An ancient scroll, unrolled to reveal text on papyrus or parchment paper. May be used to represent the study of history or official documents, such as a diploma.

title: 🌖 Waning Gibbous Moon
description: Waning Gibbous Moon was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name “Waning Gibbous Moon Symbol” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: ⛄ Snowman Without Snow
description: A snowman emoji, made out of snow (usually by children) in winter. The name Snowman Without Snow indicates that it is not snowing on the snowman.

title: ♐ Sagittarius
description: The Sagittarius astrological sign in the Zodiac. This Zodiac Symbol represents an Archer.

title: 🏺 Amphora
description: A tall, ceramic jar with two handles and a narrow neck and foot. Represents an amphora, as used by ancient Greeks and Romans to hold water and wine.

title: 📺 Television
description: A classic television set, as people watched before streaming on flatscreens. Depicted in various colors and styles with a screen, knobs, and, on many platforms, rabbit-ear antennae.

title: 🇲🇺 Flag: Mauritius
description: The flag for Mauritius, which may show as the letters MU on some platforms.

title: 💎 Gem Stone
description: A jewel or gem, as set into a ring. Depicted in the shape of a classic diamond but in the bright blue color of an aquamarine.

title: 🚯 No Littering
description: A person dropping litter (rubbish, trash) with a red stroke through it, indicating that littering is prohibited in this area.

title: 🇦🇶 Flag: Antarctica
description: The flag for Antarctica, which may show as the letters AQ on some platforms.

title: 🐢 Turtle
description: A turtle with shell. Looks similar to a tortoise.

title: ⌛ Hourglass Done
description: A classic hourglass, all of its sand having flowed into the bottom bulb. Indicates time has passed. Color varies across platforms.

title: ♊ Gemini
description: The Gemini astrological sign in the Zodiac. This Zodiac Symbol represents Twins.

title: 🗞️ Rolled-Up Newspaper
description: A newspaper rolled up and bound, as for delivery to a house. Generally positioned at a 45° angle. Commonly used for various content concerning news, media, and journalism as well as personal news.

title: 🇱🇷 Flag: Liberia
description: The flag for Liberia, which may show as the letters LR on some platforms.

title: 😀 Grinning Face
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and a broad, open smile, showing upper teeth and tongue on some platforms. Often conveys general pleasure and good cheer or humor.

title: 👢 Woman’s Boot
description: A tall boot generally featuring a slight heel, shown in brown or red on most platforms.

title: 🎿 Skis
description: A pair of skis which are shown on some platforms alongside ski poles and/or ski boots. The color and design of the skis varies by platform, with some versions also showing the skis moving at speed.

title: ❌ Cross Mark
description: A large red cross mark, displayed in the shape of a letter X and similar to a multiplication sign.

title: 💻 Laptop Computer
description: A laptop personal computer. Depicted as a black or gray device, opened to show a dark or blue screen, keyboard, and touchpad.

title: 👱 Person: Blond Hair
description: A person with blond hair, which tends to appear as yellow. Displayed as a man on all platforms, this emoji keeps blond hair no matter which skin tone is chosen.

title: 💈 Barber Pole
description: A pole spiraled with red, white, and blue stripes, as spins out front of a barbershop. Commonly used for various content concerning haircutting and hairstyling.

title: ⛽ Fuel Pump
description: A fuel pump, used to fill up a vehicle with gas / petrol.

title: 🇭🇲 Flag: Heard & McDonald Islands
description: The flag for  Heard & McDonald Islands, which may show as the letters HM on some platforms. This is the same flag as Australia.

title: 🎏 Carp Streamer
description: Japanese koinobori, decorative, carp-shaped windsocks flown in celebration of Children’s Day on May 5 in Japan. Generally depicted as a blue and red stylized carp fish on a golden pole.

title: 🧛‍♀️ Woman Vampire
description: The Woman Vampire emoji is a sequence of the 🧛 Vampire and ♀ Female Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: ✍️ Writing Hand
description: A right hand holding a pen or pencil and writing. Shown with a blue pen on all platforms except Apple which has a black pen.

title: 🇮🇳 Flag: India
description: The flag for India, which may show as the letters IN on some platforms.

title: 🇦🇬 Flag: Antigua & Barbuda
description: The Flag: Antigua & Barbuda emoji is a sequence of the 🇦 Regional Indicator Symbol Letter A and 🇬 Regional Indicator Symbol Letter G emojis. These display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🚔 Oncoming Police Car
description: A police car, shown with an emergency light on the top.

title: 😘 Face Blowing a Kiss
description: A yellow face winking with puckered lips blowing a kiss, depicted as a small, red heart. May represent a kiss goodbye or good night and convey feelings of love and affection more generally.

title: 🌊 Water Wave
description: A wave in the ocean or open sea. Could be used to surf on, or to jump waves at the beach.

title: 🇮🇹 Flag: Italy
description: The flag for Italy, which may show as the letters IT on some platforms.

title: 👦 Boy
description: The face of a boy, smiling. Previously differentiated from the man emoji on Android by wearing a cap, and on iOS by the lack of any facial hair.

title: 🧁 Cupcake
description: An individual cupcake in a liner topped with a swirl of frosting and sprinkles. The style of cupcake widely varies across platforms. The cake may be sponge or chocolate, the frosting pink or white, and the sprinkles rainbow or red.

title: 👌 OK Hand
description: A gesture showing the index finger and thumb touching to make an open circle. Represents “I’m okay” or “yes, that’s correct / good”.

title: 🇨🇦 Flag: Canada
description: The flag for Canada, which may show as the letters CA on some platforms.

title: 🤸‍♂️ Man Cartwheeling
description: The Man Cartwheeling emoji is a sequence of the 🤸 Person Doing Cartwheel and ♂ Male Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 📽️ Film Projector
description: A classic film projector, as projects film onto a screen for viewing. Generally depicted as a black or gray projector with two mounted reels and lens pointed right.

title: 🔜 Soon Arrow
description: The word "soon" with an arrow above it, pointing to the right.

title: 🚰 Potable Water
description: A symbol for potable (drinkable) water, usually shown with a faucet filling a drinking glass. Commonly used for various content concerning water, drinking, thirst, and dripping.

title: 🤜 Right-Facing Fist
description: A fist pointing right, which may be used in conjunction with the left-facing fist to complete a fist-bump gesture.

title: 👳‍♀️ Woman Wearing Turban
description: The female version of the 👳 Man Wearing Turban emoji.

title: 🍄 Mushroom
description: The edible fungus of the mushroom, depicted as a toadstool with a white-spotted red cap and stem.

title: 🆙 Up! Button
description: The word up with an exclamation point after it, shown enclosed in a square. Originally intended to denote leveling up in a game.

title: 🧚‍♂️ Man Fairy
description: The Man Fairy emoji is a sequence of the 🧚 Fairy and ♂ Male Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🕵️‍♀️ Woman Detective
description: The female version of the 🕵 Sleuth or Spy emoji.

title: 😈 Smiling Face With Horns
description: A face, usually purple, with devil horns, a wide grin, and eyes and eyebrows scrunched downward in the same manner as 😠 Angry Face on most platforms. Google’s design is red and Facebook’s has black horns and green eyes.

title: 🤚 Raised Back of Hand
description: A raised hand, showing the reverse side of the palm. May be paired with the forward-facing raised hand emoji.

title: 🎦 Cinema
description: An emoji representing the cinema: a large screen showing the latest movies, available to the public. Displayed by most platforms as a film projector symbol, and previously by Google and Microsoft as a cinema screen with curtains.

title: 👷‍♀️ Woman Construction Worker
description: The female version of the 👷 Construction Worker emoji.

title: 🇭🇷 Flag: Croatia
description: The flag for Croatia, which may show as the letters HR on some platforms.

title: 🐪 Camel
description: A camel with one hump, found in parts of Africa and India. More common than the two-hump Bactrian Camel.

title: 🥮 Moon Cake
description: The round, golden-brown pastry of a Chinese mooncake, a traditional delicacy and lunar symbol of the Mid-Autumn Festival. Many platforms feature a design or character imprinted on the crust, and depict a slice cut out to show a brown paste with a duck egg yolk inside. Twitter displays the Chinese character for “fall/autumn” or “harvest” (秋) on top.

title: 🦹‍♂️ Man Supervillain
description: The Man Supervillain emoji is a sequence of the 🦹 Supervillain and ♂ Male Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🐕 Dog
description: A dog, which appears as various different breeds depending on the platform it is being viewed on.

title: 🔊 Speaker High Volume
description: A speaker cone displayed with three sound waves, generally used as an icon to indicate the increasing of volume on a phone or computer.

title: ♓ Pisces
description: The Pisces astrological sign in the Zodiac. This Zodiac Symbol represents a Fish.

title: 🐡 Blowfish
description: A spiky-looking fish which is eaten as a delicacy in Japan, where it is known as fugu.

title: 📠 Fax Machine
description: A fax machine, as scans and transmits documents over a telephone line. Common in the 1980–90s before the internet. Depicted as a white or black machine with a telephone handset, keypad, display screen, and paper in its tray. Very occasionally used as icon before a fax number or as a pun on facts.

title: 💧 Droplet
description: A single drop of water, or another blue liquid. May be used as a single drop of sweat.

title: 😍 Smiling Face With Heart-Eyes
description: A yellow face with an open smile, sometimes showing teeth, and red, cartoon-styled hearts for eyes. Often conveys enthusiastic feelings of love, infatuation, and adoration, e.g., I love/am in love with this person or thing.

title: 🌩️ Cloud With Lightning
description: A storm cloud with a bolt of lightning coming out of it.

title: 🇹🇬 Flag: Togo
description: The flag for Togo, which may show as the letters TG on some platforms.

title: 🐵 Monkey Face
description: The face of a monkey. Similar to the monkey emoji, but only showing the head, and not the entire body. Also available as an Animoji on iOS.

title: 🏕️ Camping
description: A campsite featuring a tent and a tree, and perhaps a campfire. Similar to the tent emoji.

title: 🏃‍♀️ Woman Running
description: The female version of the 🏃 Runner emoji.

title: ☕ Hot Beverage
description: A cup of a steaming-hot beverage, usually taken as coffee or tea. Sometimes shown on a saucer. Samsung features a foamy-white tulip latte art design.

title: 🥩 Cut of Meat
description: A cut of uncooked red meat, as a T-bone or rib-eye steak, with the light, white marbling of fat.

title: 🏨 Hotel
description: A hotel building, displayed on most platforms as a building with many windows and a letter H on the front.

title: 🧙 Mage
description: Mage was approved as part of Unicode 10.0 in 2017 and added to Emoji 5.0 in 2017.

title: 🈴 Japanese “Passing Grade” Button
description: Means “agreement” in Japanese. More literally, it means to unite, or join together.

title: 😯 Hushed Face
description: A yellow face with small, open eyes, raised eyebrows, and a small, open mouth, as if it has been hushed by concern or correction. Meaning widely varies, but its expression is commonly taken as surprise, embarrassment, or mild excitement.

title: ☀️ Sun
description: The sun; a warm ball of fire that keeps life on earth viable. Represents sunny weather, or hot days.

title: ♠️ Spade Suit
description: A spade symbol emoji, which is used in card games for the spades suit.

title: ⚡ High Voltage
description: Most commonly used as a lightning bolt for stormy weather, this symbol is intended to be a warning for high voltage

title: 👬 Men Holding Hands
description: Two men holding hands, most likely due to being in a relationship.

title: 🗣️ Speaking Head
description: The silhouette of a person speaking. Faces left-to-right, with lines demonstrating speech being expelled. Sometimes used in the context of shouting or mansplaining.

title: 💁‍♂️ Man Tipping Hand
description: The male version of the 💁 Information Desk Person emoji.

title: 🍋 Lemon
description: The sour, yellow-colored citrus fruit of the lemon, usually with a stem and green leaf or leaves.

title: 👨‍💻 Man Technologist
description: A man behind a computer screen, working in the field of technology.

title: 🧔 Man: Beard
description: A person with a visible beard. Generally displayed with a masculine appearance.

title: 📣 Megaphone
description: Megaphone was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name “Cheering Megaphone” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🦶 Foot
description: A human foot shown with five toes and may include part or all of the ankle. Shown on Apple platforms as the sole of a foot.

title: 🥠 Fortune Cookie
description: A golden-brown, crescent-shaped, vanilla-flavored fortune cookie. Usually depicted with a strip of paper—on which a wise saying, lucky numbers, or Chinese vocabulary is written—peaking out of its hollow shell. Given at the end of meals at Chinese restaurants in the West.

title: 🇦🇨 Flag: Ascension Island
description: The flag for Ascension Island, which may show as the letters AC on some platforms. This same flag is used for St. Helena and Tristan Da Cunha.

title: 🚨 Police Car Light
description: A revolving red light seen on top of a police car. Often used in emergency circumstances in addition to a siren making a loud warning sound.

title: 🚵 Person Mountain Biking
description: A person (cyclist) who rides a mountain bike: a type of off-road bicycle. Intended to be gender-neutral.

title: 🇱🇸 Flag: Lesotho
description: The flag for Lesotho, which may show as the letters LS on some platforms.

title: 👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩 Kiss: Woman, Woman
description: Two women displayed kissing, or gesturing a kiss toward each other. At small sizes this may be difficult to discern from two men kissing.

title: 🇯🇴 Flag: Jordan
description: The flag for Jordan, which may show as the letters JO on some platforms.

title: 🏢 Office Building
description: A generic, high-rise office building. Generally found in cities, and most active during business hours.

title: 🏍️ Motorcycle
description: A motorcycle, otherwise known as a motorbike used for sport/racing purposes. For a transport-based motorcycle, use a motor scooter.

title: 🐬 Dolphin
description: A dolphin emoji, leaping in the air. Considered to be one of the most intelligent animals on Earth.

title: 🇲🇲 Flag: Myanmar (Burma)
description: The flag for Myanmar, which may show as the letters MM on some platforms.

title: ◻️ White Medium Square
description: White Medium Square was approved as part of Unicode 3.2 in 2002 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🇬🇫 Flag: French Guiana
description: The flag for French Guiana, which may show as the letters GF on some platforms.

title: 🆕 New Button
description: The word new, shown enclosed in a square.

title: 🔈 Speaker Low Volume
description: A speaker cone displayed without any sound waves.

title: ❓ Question Mark
description: Question Mark was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name “Black Question Mark Ornament” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 😁 Beaming Face With Smiling Eyes
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and full-toothed grin, as if saying Cheese! for the camera. Teeth may be smoothed-over or crosshatched. Often expresses a radiant, gratified happiness. Tone varies, including warm, silly, amused, or proud.

title: 🔧 Wrench
description: A metal wrench (spanner), as used for turning nuts and bolts. Depicted with two open, crescent-shaped ends or one open end and a closed, ring-shaped end. Generally positioned at a 45° angle.

title: 🐻 Bear Face
description: A cute bear face, displayed more like a teddy bear emoji than an accurate depiction of a real bear. Also available as an Animoji on iOS.

title: 🏑 Field Hockey
description: A hockey stick and ball, used in the sport of field hockey. Not to be confused with the ice hockey stick and puck.

title: 😕 Confused Face
description: A yellow face with open eyes and a skewed frown, as if scrunching its cheeks or chewing its lips. A look of feeling unsure. An Google’s design heightens its intended puzzlement by including contorted eyebrows.

title: 🦃 Turkey
description: A turkey: a bird that is often cooked and eaten at Thanksgiving or Christmas. This emoji displays as a live turkey (similar to the presentation of the duck emoji) as opposed to turkey meat such as the poultry leg.

title: 📙 Orange Book
description: A closed, orange, hardcover book—similar to the Emojipedia logo 📙😃. Commonly used for various content concerning reading, writing, learning, and schooling. May also be used as an orange accent color.

title: 🇧🇿 Flag: Belize
description: The flag for Belize, which may show as the letters BZ on some platforms.

title: 🇰🇬 Flag: Kyrgyzstan
description: The flag for Kyrgyzstan, which may show as the letters KG on some platforms.

title: ⛔ No Entry
description: No Entry was approved as part of Unicode 5.2 in 2009 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🙊 Speak-No-Evil Monkey
description: One of the three wise monkeys, known as Iwazaru.

title: 🦂 Scorpion
description: A scorpion shown with eight legs and an upright rail. May also be used in relation to the zodiac sign Scorpius.

title: 👾 Alien Monster
description: A friendly-looking, tentacled space creature with two eyes. Most major platforms style their design after aliens in classic arcade games like Space Invaders, rendering it purple and pixellated, as if in 8-bit graphics.

title: 👟 Running Shoe
description: A sneaker – a comfortable shoe used in sports such as tennis or golf, or for fashion purposes.

title: 👩‍🚒 Woman Firefighter
description: The Woman Firefighter emoji is a sequence of the 👩 Woman and 🚒 Fire Engine emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🧟‍♂️ Man Zombie
description: The Man Zombie emoji is a sequence of the 🧟 Zombie and ♂ Male Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🚞 Mountain Railway
description: A train and railway in the mountains. Displayed as a funicular in Microsoft’s artwork, or a regular train on other platforms.

title: 👩‍👧 Family: Woman, Girl
description: The Family: Woman, Girl emoji is a sequence of the 👩 Woman and 👧 Girl emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🏓 Ping Pong
description: A paddle and ping pong ball used in the sport of table tennis.

title: 🥝 Kiwi Fruit
description: A kiwifruit, or Chinese gooseberry, with its fuzzy, brown skin sliced open to show its light-green flesh, white core, and black seeds.

title: 🗳️ Ballot Box With Ballot
description: A ballot box, as used to cast votes in an election. Depicted as a box, generally blue or gray, with a slot on top through which a paper ballot is being inserted. Many platforms display a cross mark or check mark on the ballot to indicate a vote, though Apple and Facebook leave theirs blank.

title: 🛃 Customs
description: A customs officer inspecting luggage. May be shown on signage at airports or other border crossings.

title: 💡 Light Bulb
description: A light bulb, as screwed into a lamp to light a room. Depicted as an incandescent bulb with a silver base, often shown with filament and a soft, yellow-white glow.

title: 📮 Postbox
description: A postbox (mailbox, letterbox) with a letter in its slot for collection. Generally depicted in red with a white envelope, styled after public postboxes in Japan. May also evoke postboxes in the United Kingdom.

title: 💙 Blue Heart
description: A blue heart emoji.

title: 🐗 Boar
description: A boar, otherwise known as a wild pig. Displayed with brown fur and prominent tusks on most platforms.

title: 🐚 Spiral Shell
description: A seashell found at the beach. It has a spiral shape, and may become home to a hermit crab.

title: 🈹 Japanese “Discount” Button
description: Symbol for a sale, or bargain prices in Japan (“cut prices”). Literally translated, this character means to cut or divide.

title: 🍦 Soft Ice Cream
description: A swirl of soft-serve ice cream atop a wafer-style cone, white or cream-colored, as vanilla, on most platforms. Facebook’s design suggests strawberry. May be used more generally for ice cream, frozen yogurt, and frozen treats.

title: 🧟 Zombie
description: A reanimated human, often found in works of horror fiction. May have a female or male appearance.

title: 🥛 Glass of Milk
description: A tall glass of white milk, as from a cow but also other mammals, nuts, or plants. Most platforms depict a glass filled near to the brim, but some show a glass half-full—or half-empty.

title: 🕯️ Candle
description: A burning candle, as lit when taking a bath or the power is out. Depicted as a white, pillar-shaped candle with a flame and wax dripping down its sides.

title: 🖋️ Fountain Pen
description: A black fountain pen with a silver nib, as used for signing important documents. Often depicted with gold hardware. Positioned at a 45° angle with its tip at the lower left. Like ✒️ Black Nib, commonly used for various content concerning writing, drawing, and signing (e.g., laws, deals, in sports).

title: 👣 Footprints
description: Two human footsteps,  showing the outline of both feet, including all five toes.

title: 🕊️ Dove
description: A dove, carrying an olive branch, as a symbol of peace.

title: 💂 Guard
description: A British guardsman, known as a foot guard. Wears a tall black hat with a yellow chin-strap. Must look straight ahead at all times, even when tourists attempt to distract them.

title: ☹️ Frowning Face
description: A classic sad face. A yellow face with simple, open eyes and wide, steep frown. May convey such feelings as moderate concern or disappointment and affectionate sadness, as when missing a loved one. Its sentiment is usually more intense than 🙁 Slightly Frowning Face, which has a smaller frown.

title: 👨‍🔬 Man Scientist
description: The Man Scientist emoji is a sequence of the 👨 Man and 🔬 Microscope emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🚤 Speedboat
description: A motorized speedboat used for recreation on lakes, or other bodies of water.

title: 💾 Floppy Disk
description: A 3.5-inch floppy disk, a data storage format popular in the 1980–90s but largely preserved as a Save icon in computer programs. Shown with its silver shutter positioned up and in a black housing with a white label, accented with blue or red.

title: 🏋️ Person Lifting Weights
description: A person lifting a barbell loaded with weights above their head.

title: 🔭 Telescope
description: A telescope, as used to gaze at stars and planets in the night sky. Shown with an optical tube mounted on a tripod, positioned at various angles and generally depicted as metal.

title: 💽 Computer Disk
description: A minidisc, depicted as a small, silver or gold optical disc housed in a square cartridge, its shutter positioned to the right.

title: 🐴 Horse Face
description: A horse’s head, shown facing forward or to the left of screen on most platforms. Looks to the right on Facebook. Distinct from the horse emoji which shows the entire horse, and not just the face.

title: 🏦 Bank
description: A retail bank branch, where people can perform money-related tasks. Also a common location to find an ATM.

title: 🐰 Rabbit Face
description: A cute, cartoon-styled rabbit face, shown with two long ears. Some platforms display this emoji with buck teeth.

title: 📗 Green Book
description: A closed, green, hardcover book. Commonly used for various content concerning reading, writing, learning, and schooling. May also be used as a green accent color.

title: 🌏 Globe Showing Asia-Australia
description: The world, showing Asia and Australia.

title: 💞 Revolving Hearts
description: Hearts revolving around one or more other hearts. This emoji was originally animated on a number of Japanese devices.

title: 🤰 Pregnant Woman
description: A pregnant woman, intended to complete the family emoji set. Sometimes used in jest to represent feeling full after over-eating; aka "food baby".

title: 🧚‍♀️ Woman Fairy
description: The Woman Fairy emoji is a sequence of the 🧚 Fairy and ♀ Female Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 💩 Pile of Poo
description: A swirl of brown poop, shaped like soft-serve ice cream with large, excited eyes and a big, friendly smile.

title: 🥿 Flat Shoe
description: A flat shoe, in a style generally worn by women. More practical than a high-heeled shoe.

title: 🙎 Person Pouting
description: A person with a serious expression, showing mild displeasure with the situation. Could be considered to be reserved or stoic in response, as this person is not visible angry.

title: ↙️ Down-Left Arrow
description: An arrow pointing diagonally in an down-left, or south-west direction.

title: 💸 Money With Wings
description: A banded stack of U.S. dollar bills with feather wings, as if flying. Its flight may represent losing, transferring, or earning money, but commonly used for wealth, money, and success more generally, often with a flourish or sense of flair.

title: 🥴 Woozy Face
description: A yellow face with a crumpled mouth and a cockeyed expression, as if tired and emotional from inebriation or smitten with love. Depicted with raised or furrowed eyebrows and at least one eye half-open. WhatsApp's design features a tongue hanging out.

title: ♿ Wheelchair Symbol
description: The international symbol of access, used to denote a facility which has been designed with accessibility or people in wheelchairs in mind. Appears as a blue sign, with a white graphic of a person sitting in a wheelchair.

title: 🔞 No One Under Eighteen
description: The number eighteen with a red stroke through it, indicating a location where a person must be aged 18 or above to enter.

title: ⬜ White Large Square
description: White Large Square was approved as part of Unicode 5.1 in 2008 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 👘 Kimono
description: A traditional Japanese robe that can be worn by women or men.

title: 🇱🇺 Flag: Luxembourg
description: The flag for Luxembourg, which may show as the letters LU on some platforms

title: 👨‍⚖️ Man Judge
description: The Man Judge emoji is a sequence of the 👨 Man and ⚖ Scales emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🆔 ID Button
description: The letters ID in a square.

title: 🤾‍♂️ Man Playing Handball
description: The Man Playing Handball emoji is a sequence of the 🤾 Handball and ♂ Male Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🥔 Potato
description: A whole potato—such as a russet, used for baking, mashing, or frying—shown with a few eyes on its golden-brown skin. Not to be confused with the roasted sweet potato.

title: 2️⃣ Keycap Digit Two
description: The Keycap Digit Two emoji is a sequence of the 2 Digit Two and ⃣ Combining Enclosing Keycap emojis. These display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🐧 Penguin
description: A penguin shown with a yellow or orange colored beak. Displayed as a face on some platforms, and the full body of a penguin on other platforms.

title: 🛠️ Hammer and Wrench
description: A hammer and wrench, as kept in a toolbox, crossed in an X shape. Depicted with metal tools facing up, the hammer positioned at the upper left. Most vendors implement the same design as for their 🔨 Hammer and 🔧 Wrench.

title: 🏀 Basketball
description: An orange-colored basketball displayed with a hoop. Many versions of this emoji omit the hoop, and display only the basketball.

title: 🦑 Squid
description: Squid was approved as part of Unicode 9.0 in 2016 and added to Emoji 3.0 in 2016.

title: 🍨 Ice Cream
description: One or more scoops of ice cream in a dessert bowl, variously topped with sprinkles, wafer rolls, or cherry and syrup. Flavors vary from vanilla, chocolate, and/or strawberry across platforms.

title: 🇬🇬 Flag: Guernsey
description: The flag for Guernsey, which may show as the letters GG on some platforms.

title: 🍢 Oden
description: A skewer of three bites of Japanese oden, a winter dish made with fishcakes, tofu, konnyaku, and a variety of other ingredients, including boiled eggs. Often served as a stew or skewered and dipped into soy sauce. Resembles the Dango and may be used for other skewered foods (e.g., shish kebab, roasting marshmallows) or spears.

title: ♒ Aquarius
description: The Aquarius astrological sign in the Zodiac. This Zodiac Symbol represents a Water-bearer.

title: 🔫 Pistol
description: A squirt gun (water pistol), as used to spray water for fun.

title: 🦗 Cricket
description: A six-legged insect shown mostly in brown or green. May be used to convey the notion of silence; as in the slang phrase "they gave me crickets" to mean "no response".

title: 🧐 Face With Monocle
description: A yellow face with furrowed eyebrows wearing a monocle. Usually depicted with a small, intent frown and head slightly upturned, as if in careful inspection.

title: 🕟 Four-Thirty
description: Four-Thirty was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name “Clock Face Four-Thirty” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🇺🇦 Flag: Ukraine
description: The flag for Ukraine, which may show as the letters UA on some platforms.

title: 💣 Bomb
description: A cartoon-styled bomb, depicted as a black ball with a burning fuse.

title: 😺 Grinning Cat Face
description: A cartoon cat variant of 😀 Grinning Face. Depicted as yellow on major platforms.

title: 👗 Dress
description: A pretty dress, suitable for a ball, party or other similar occasion.

title: 👨‍✈️ Man Pilot
description: The Man Pilot emoji is a sequence of the 👨 Man and ✈ Airplane emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 📷 Camera
description: A classic camera, as an SLR used to take pictures before camera phones. Generally depicted with a black and silver casing with lens and operating controls.

title: 🐆 Leopard
description: A leopard emoji which has a yellow or gold colored coat with black spots.

title: 🚱 Non-Potable Water
description: A water tap with a red stroke through it, indicating that water is not safe for drinking (non-potable).

title: 🗓️ Spiral Calendar
description: A spiral-bound calendar. Generally depicted as a monthly calendar, with a red or blue header. Apple and Samsung’s pages are curled up at the bottom right, as to flip for a new month.

title: 🧫 Petri Dish
description: A petri dish, as used to culture microbes. Depicted as a clear, shallow cylinder with a red, blue, or green growth medium, such as agar, with splotches of variously colored cells, like bacteria.

title: 👩‍👩‍👧‍👦 Family: Woman, Woman, Girl, Boy
description: A family with two mothers, one daughter, and one son.

title: 🇦🇴 Flag: Angola
description: The flag for Angola, which may show as the letters A and O on some platforms.

title: ✊ Raised Fist
description: A fist raised in the air that may be used as a celebratory gesture: the fist pump. Can also be used to represent zero items, due to a lack of any fingers being held up.

title: 🇲🇰 Flag: North Macedonia
