description: The flag for North Macedonia (until 2019: Macedonia), which may show as the letters MK on some platforms.

title: 🏪 Convenience Store
description: A shop that is generally open for longer hours than a regular supermarket, sometimes 24 hours per day.

title: 🌠 Shooting Star
description: A star displaying a path of light behind it, indicating movement through the sky.

title: 🤩 Star-Struck
description: A yellow face with a broad, open smile, showing upper teeth on most platforms, with stars for eyes, as if seeing a beloved celebrity. Color of stars widely varies by platform, though commonly gold or red. May express that someone or something is amazing, fascinating, impressive, or exciting.

title: 🎮 Video Game
description: A video game emoji, shown on major platforms as a console gamepad with D-pad, joysticks, and buttons.

title: 🍜 Steaming Bowl
description: A bowl of steaming-hot food. Depicted as Japanese ramen (noodles in broth) with chopsticks on most platforms, though it can represent a warm meal more generally. Samsung’s design resembles Pot of Food.

title: 🇻🇨 Flag: St. Vincent & Grenadines
description: The Flag: St. Vincent & Grenadines emoji is a sequence of the 🇻 Regional Indicator Symbol Letter V and 🇨 Regional Indicator Symbol Letter C emojis. These display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: ⁉️ Exclamation Question Mark
description: Exclamation Question Mark was approved as part of Unicode 3.0 in 1999  and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 👨‍🦳 Man: White Hair
description: The Man: White Hair emoji is a sequence of the 👨 Man and 🦳 Emoji Component White Hair emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 📬 Open Mailbox With Raised Flag
description: An open, curbside mailbox (letterbox, postbox) with its signal flag raised and a letter in its open slot. Generally depicted in blue or gray with a red flag and white envelope (Google's design is yellow). Used for various content concerning postal deliveries and email.

title: 🔶 Large Orange Diamond
description: A larger version of the small orange diamond emoji.

title: 🇹🇨 Flag: Turks & Caicos Islands
description: The Flag: Turks & Caicos Islands emoji is a sequence of the 🇹 Regional Indicator Symbol Letter T and 🇨 Regional Indicator Symbol Letter C emojis. These display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🏆 Trophy
description: A trophy given as an recognition of achievement, usually in sports. The trophy emoji is a gold cup, with a engraving on the bottom detailing the award.

title: 🆘 SOS Button
description: SOS is the description for the distress signal in Morse Code. This emoji means SOS or “emergency”.

title: 📆 Tear-Off Calendar
description: A single date on a calendar. Generally depicted as a page on a two-ringed, daily desk calendar, as flipped or torn off to change the date. Displays month (usually abbreviated and in a red or blue header) and day on a white, square page, curled up at the bottom right.

title: 🇧🇦 Flag: Bosnia & Herzegovina
description: The Flag: Bosnia & Herzegovina emoji is a sequence of the 🇧 Regional Indicator Symbol Letter B and 🇦 Regional Indicator Symbol Letter A emojis. These display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🌡️ Thermometer
description: A liquid-in-glass thermometer, as used to measure temperature. Depicted at various angles with a red liquid risen from the bulb to various levels on the scale. Commonly used for content concerning high temperatures, including warm weather, illness (having a fever), and various slang senses of hot.

title: 🏃 Person Running
description: A person running, with a large stride and arms outstretched. May be wearing a running shirt.

title: 〽️ Part Alternation Mark
description: Used in traditional Japanese music such as Noh or Renga, to indicate the start of a song. More specifically, the part alternation mark is displayed where the singer’s part begins.

title: 👩‍👩‍👦‍👦 Family: Woman, Woman, Boy, Boy
description: A family with two mothers, and two sons.

title: ⚾ Baseball
description: A white baseball, with regulation red stitching. Used in the game of the same name, baseball.

title: 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿 Flag: England
description: The flag for England, a country in the United Kingdom. May show as the letters gbeng.

title: 🧞‍♂️ Man Genie
description: The Man Genie emoji is a sequence of the 🧞 Genie and ♂ Male Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🔢 Input Numbers
description: A symbol showing the numbers 1, 2, 3 and 4. Intended to be used on a software keyboard, or other input screen to enable symbol input, as opposed to alphabetical or symbol input.

title: 🥯 Bagel
description: The brown bread of a bagel, shown sliced in two halves. Some platforms depict seeds, as sesame or poppy, and a schmear of cream cheese, with the bagel assembled as a sandwich. May resemble the Doughnut at small sizes.

title: 💮 White Flower
description: An emoji symbol of a white flower, often a cherry blossom.

title: 🐑 Ewe
description: A white sheep which is similar in appearance to the ram emoji. May be found on a farm.

title: 🤝 Handshake
description: Two hands performing a handshake gesture, indicating a cordial greeting between friends or associates.

title: 🎳 Bowling
description: Ten-pin bowling emoji, showing a bowling ball and pins.

title: 🇲🇩 Flag: Moldova
description: The flag for Moldova, which may show as the letters MD on some platforms.

title: 🇲🇹 Flag: Malta
description: The flag for Malta, which may show as the letters MT on some platforms.

title: 👼 Baby Angel
description: An angelic baby with wings, and a halo above its head. Commonly known as a cherub.

title: 🅰️ A Button (Blood Type)
description: A symbol representing Blood Type A. Displayed as the letter A on a red background.

title: ℹ️ Information
description: A lowercase letter i, enclosed in a rounded square or circle. Implemented in apps or websites to indicate that help or further information is available.

title: 🈲 Japanese “Prohibited” Button
description: This Emoji means “prohibit, restrict or forbid” in Japanese.

title: 🛷 Sled
description: A sled, otherwise known as a toboggan or sledge.

title: 👚 Woman’s Clothes
description: A blouse worn by women in a neat-casual setting.

title: 🎉 Party Popper
description: A party popper, as explodes in a shower of confetti and streamers at a celebration. Generally depicted as a gold party hat, striped on some platforms, at a 45° angle, with multicolored confetti and streamers coming from its opening at the upper right. Twitter’s cone is red.

title: 🙆‍♂️ Man Gesturing OK
description: The male version of the 🙆 Face With OK Gesture emoji.

title: 🔃 Clockwise Vertical Arrows
description: Clockwise Vertical Arrows was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name “Clockwise Downwards and Upwards Open Circle Arrows” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 📘 Blue Book
description: A closed, blue, hardcover book. Commonly used for various content concerning reading, writing, learning, and schooling. May also be used as a blue accent color.

title: ⤵️ Right Arrow Curving Down
description: A curved arrow pointing down.

title: ㊗️ Japanese “Congratulations” Button
description: Translated from Japanese, this means "congratulations" or "pray for happiness".

title: 👠 High-Heeled Shoe
description: A high-heeled shoe, primarily worn by women. Generally found in a context which requires formal dress, such as social occasions, or some work places.

title: 🇵🇲 Flag: St. Pierre & Miquelon
description: The Flag: St. Pierre & Miquelon emoji is a sequence of the 🇵 Regional Indicator Symbol Letter P and 🇲 Regional Indicator Symbol Letter M emojis. These display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🏤 Post Office
description: A European-style post office. A postal horn can be seen on the front, which is commonly found in the logos of European Postal Services.

title: 😦 Frowning Face With Open Mouth
description: A yellow face with small, open eyes and an open frown. Samsung’s design shows upper teeth and tongue. Meaning widely varies, but may convey mild sadness, disappointment, concern, and amazement.

title: 🤽‍♀️ Woman Playing Water Polo
description: The Woman Playing Water Polo emoji is a sequence of the 🤽 Water Polo and ♀ Female Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🏅 Sports Medal
description: A gold medal, given to a person who has won a sporting event, such as a race. Not to be confused with the military medal emoji.

title: ✖️ Heavy Multiplication X
description: Heavy Multiplication X was approved as part of Unicode 1.1 in 1993 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🦟 Mosquito
description: Mosquito was approved as part of Unicode 11.0 in 2018 and added to Emoji 11.0 in 2018.

title: 🖨️ Printer
description: A computer printer, as at a home office. Generally depicted as a grayish device with a power button and paper loaded in its tray, sometimes printing out a document. May be used for various content concerning printing, including as a Print icon, as well as for office work and technology more generally.

title: 🐞 Lady Beetle
description: A ladybug emoji, the colloquial name for the coccinellidae family of small beetles. Known as a ladybird or lad beetle in some countries.

title: 👍 Thumbs Up
description: A thumbs-up gesture indicating approval.

title: 🦞 Lobster
description: A lobster emoji, shown from above on most platforms. The pink/red color of this emoji implies that the lobster is no longer alive, and is in a state to be served as seafood for eating.

title: 🦆 Duck
description: A bird that enjoys spending its time on water. Shown on most platforms as a mallard with brown, white and green colors.

title: 🇿🇼 Flag: Zimbabwe
description: The flag for Zimbabwe, which may show as the letters ZW on some platforms.

title: ⛳ Flag in Hole
description: A red, triangular flag shown sitting in the hole of a golf course green. Some versions of this emoji also include golf balls.

title: ◼️ Black Medium Square
description: Black Medium Square was approved as part of Unicode 3.2 in 2002 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🍚 Cooked Rice
description: A bowl of steamed white rice, a staple component of cuisine throughout Asia. Bowl color varies across platforms, though is often white.

title: ✂️ Scissors
description: A pair of scissors, as used to cut paper or hair. Generally shown open, blades down, with red handles. Commonly used for content concerning haircuts, fashion design, arts and crafts, and various senses of cutting.

title: 📹 Video Camera
description: A video camera, as a camcorder used to film home videos in the 1980–90s. Generally depicted as a gray or black video camera with viewfinder, control buttons, and lens pointed left.

title: 🎐 Wind Chime
description: A Japanese wind chime. Depicted as a glass bell with a strip of paper suspended from its clapper, often decorated with cherry blossom-like flowers.

title: 🇪🇨 Flag: Ecuador
description: The flag for Ecuador, which may show as the letters EC on some platforms.

title: 😭 Loudly Crying Face
description: A yellow face with an open mouth wailing and streams of heavy tears flowing from closed eyes. May convey inconsolable grief but also other intense feelings, such as uncontrollable laughter or overwhelming joy.

title: 🍡 Dango
description: A Japanese sweet dumpling made from rice flour and served on a skewer. Depicted as a botchan dango, comprising a pink, white or light yellow, and green ball, as colored by red beans, egg, and green tea. Resembles the Oden and featured in the Moon Viewing Ceremony, used in the Japanese festival to celebrate the full moon.

title: 😋 Face Savoring Food
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and a broad, closed smile with its tongue sticking out of one corner, as if licking its lips in appetite or contentment. Widely used to convey that a food item is delicious. May also express that a person is attractive.

title: 🈁 Japanese “Here” Button
description: Means “Here” in Japanese, referring to a destination.

title: 🎱 Pool 8 Ball
description: The game of billiards, of which pool is a common version. This emoji displays the black 8 ball on most platforms, which looks similar to the Magic 8-Ball toy.

title: 🛄 Baggage Claim
description: Baggage Claim was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🌆 Cityscape at Dusk
description: A view of city buildings as the last light disappears from the sky. An orange (or blue) glow lingers, before the stars of the night sky become visible.

title: 💤 Zzz
description: A series of three Zs making a Zzz. Represents sleeping, snoring, dreaming, or any sleep-related state. Can also be used in some contexts to represent something that is boring.

title: 🐭 Mouse Face
description: A mouse face, drawn in cartoon-style with whiskers and two rounded ears.

title: 👨‍👩‍👧 Family: Man, Woman, Girl
description: A family with a father, mother, and one daughter.

title: 🆑 CL Button
description: CL is what shows on the CLear button of some older mobile phones.

title: 🎯 Direct Hit
description: A dart board with dart hitting the center / bullseye region.

title: 🚴 Person Biking
description: A person riding a bicycle for leisure, sport or transport. Intended to be gender-neutral.

title: 🔴 Red Circle
description: Red Circle was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name “Large Red Circle” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 📭 Open Mailbox With Lowered Flag
description: A curbside mailbox (letterbox, postbox) with its signal flag lowered and its slot empty. Generally depicted in blue or gray with a red flag. Used for various content concerning postal deliveries and email.

title: 🚝 Monorail
description: Similar to a train, but running on a single track. Monorails are often found at theme parks, or other tourist destinations.

title: 🎺 Trumpet
description: A trumpet, a brass instrument played in jazz bands.

title: 🅾️ O Button (Blood Type)
description: A symbol representing Blood Type O. Displayed as the letter O on a red background.

title: 🇺🇬 Flag: Uganda
description: The flag for Uganda, which may show as the letters UG on some platforms.

title: 🙇‍♀️ Woman Bowing
description: The female version of the 🙇 Person Bowing Deeply emoji.

title: 🇲🇫 Flag: St. Martin
description: The flag for St. Martin, which may show as the letters MF on some platforms. This is the French half of the of the Caribbean island of Saint Martin. Not to be confused with Sint Maarten, the Dutch half of the same island.

title: 💆‍♂️ Man Getting Massage
description: The male version of the 💆 Face Massage emoji.

title: 🥽 Goggles
description: Goggles of a type that are not specified, but implied to be safety goggles instead of swimming goggles.

title: 🥒 Cucumber
description: A long, green cucumber with bumpy skin. Resembles its derived product, a pickle or gherkin, on many platforms, except on Apple and WhatsApp, which depict it with light-green, seed-y slices.

title: 💏 Kiss
description: Two people displayed kissing, or gesturing a kiss toward each other. Generally displayed as a woman and man.

title: 💒 Wedding
description: An emoji to depict a wedding, displayed by most vendors as a Christian church and love hearts. Some platforms display a cross or bell on the building.

title: 🐂 Ox
description: Ox was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🤴 Prince
description: Male royalty, intended as a gender pair for the princess emoji. Shown as a man with a crown.

title: ➗ Heavy Division Sign
description: Heavy Division Sign was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🕴️ Man in Suit Levitating
description: A man wearing a suit, hovering above the ground with a shadow displayed beneath him. Generally shown wearing a fedora or similar style of hat.

title: ⛪ Church
description: A church building, generally associated with Christian denominations. In addition quiet prayer, churches hold regular worship services, weddings, baptisms and funerals.

title: ⚔️ Crossed Swords
description: Two swords with steel blades in an X shape, as crossed for combat between two knights or warriors. Generally depicted as straight, double-edged blades with brown or black, cross-shaped hilts, points directed up. Commonly used as a symbol for battle, fighting, or a contest, as in sports.

title: 🎆 Fireworks
description: Firework emoji, showing a explosion of colored light in the night sky, used for any number of celebrations such as New Year's Eve.

title: 🙋‍♀️ Woman Raising Hand
description: The female version of the 🙋 Happy Person Raising One Hand emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.

title: 🇽🇰 Flag: Kosovo
description: The flag for Kosovo, which may show as the letters XK on some platforms.

title: 🍺 Beer Mug
description: A beer, as a golden-colored lager, in a frosty mug. Depicted with a frothy head spilling over the brim. Clinking Beer Mugs is a variation that displays two such beer mugs.

title: 🇧🇲 Flag: Bermuda
description: The flag for Bermuda, which may show as the letters BM on some platforms.

title: 🇬🇪 Flag: Georgia
description: The flag for Georgia, which may show as the letters GE on some platforms.

title: 🏧 ATM Sign
description: ATM Sign was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name “Automated Teller Machine” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🎗️ Reminder Ribbon
description: An awareness ribbon, worn to show support of a cause or group.

title: 🦴 Bone
description: A bone which may be used for a dog to chew on, or as a part of the human body. The type of bone is not specified.

title: 👩‍🔬 Woman Scientist
description: The Woman Scientist emoji is a sequence of the 👩 Woman and 🔬 Microscope emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🦉 Owl
description: An owl, shown facing forward, with two large eyes and a yellow beak.

title: 🌿 Herb
description: A herb, such as basil or oregano. Appears on most platforms as a small, green plant with 3-6 leaves.

title: 👨‍🍳 Man Cook
description: The Man Cook emoji is a sequence of the 👨 Man and 🍳 Cooking emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🚶‍♀️ Woman Walking
description: The female version of the 🚶 Pedestrian emoji.

title: 👇 Backhand Index Pointing Down
description: Index finger pointing downward.

title: 🐅 Tiger
description: A tiger emoji; orange with black stripes. Created in a photorealistic style in Apple’s artwork, and cartoon style in Google’s version.

title: 🌟 Glowing Star
description: A five-point star of pale-yellow color, with small bursts of light shining around it. Generally used for visual flair rather than astronomical purposes.

title: 🍯 Honey Pot
description: A golden-yellow pot of honey, as made by bees and desired by bears. Shown with the sweet substance oozing down its sides, often with a honey dipper inside the small vessel.

title: 🇪🇬 Flag: Egypt
description: The flag for Egypt, which may show as the letters EG on some platforms.

title: 🍸 Cocktail Glass
description: A stemmed glass with a cone-shaped bowl, used for serving cocktails. Depicted as a martini garnished with an olive. Might be gin or vodka, shaken or stirred. See also Tropical Drink.

title: 🇦🇷 Flag: Argentina
description: The flag for Argentina, which may show as the letters AR on some platforms.

title: 🎞️ Film Frames
description: A strip of film, as used in a movie camera or photography. Generally depicted as several horizontal frames of unexposed film with black trim and perforations.

title: 🎚️ Level Slider
description: A level slider, as adjusts volume on a mixing console. Most platforms depict a silver and black channel fader with scale markings, set to various levels.

title: 📱 Mobile Phone
description: A mobile phone (cell phone), as used to text, check social media, or take selfies. Depicted as a black or gray smartphone with a generic blue screen or multicolored app icons. Commonly used for various content concerning mobile phones, technology, and communication.

title: 🇧🇪 Flag: Belgium
description: The flag for Belgium, which may show as the letters BE on some platforms.

title: ⚽ Soccer Ball
description: A round, black and white ball used in the game of soccer, which is known as football in much of the world. See also: emojis for the World Cup.

title: 🔐 Locked With Key
description: A locked (closed) padlock with an upright key at its right. Vendors implement the same designs as their 🔒 Locked and 🔑 Key.

title: 🌎 Globe Showing Americas
description: The world, showing North and South America.

title: 🇻🇪 Flag: Venezuela
description: The flag for Venezuela, which may show as the letters VE on some platforms.

title: 🧙‍♀️ Woman Mage
description: The Woman Mage emoji is a sequence of the 🧙 Mage and ♀ Female Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🤸 Person Cartwheeling
description: A person doing a cartwheel, representing the sport of gymnastics.

title: 🇲🇾 Flag: Malaysia
description: The flag for Malaysia, which may show as the letters MY on some platforms.

title: 🍼 Baby Bottle
description: A bottle of milk or formula, as or fed to a baby, with a bluish cap and rubber nipple or teat. Positioned upright or at a 45° angle, and filled to various levels, sometimes showing fill lines. Often used for newborns and childrearing. See also Breast-Feeding.

title: 🛳️ Passenger Ship
description: Passenger Ship was approved as part of Unicode 7.0 in 2014 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 👪 Family
description: A family unit represented on most platforms as a father, mother, and one or more children.

title: 🎙️ Studio Microphone
description: A microphone, as used for radio broadcasting or studio recording. Most platforms depict a vintage, silver microphone, like the Shure Unidyne 55.

title: 🍿 Popcorn
description: The buttery-white snack of popcorn brimming in a classic red-and-white-striped carton, as enjoyed at a movie theater.

title: 🌳 Deciduous Tree
description: A type of tree that has leaves turn orange or brown and fall off during the season of fall / autumn.

title: 📸 Camera With Flash
description: A classic camera, shown with its flash going off, as to illuminate a darker scene. Vendors implement the same design as 📷 Camera with a burst of light, often resembling 💥 Collision.

title: 📑 Bookmark Tabs
description: Sheets of white, printed paper with variously colored tabs to bookmark important sections or indicate signature lines. Commonly used for content concerning various types of documents and writing.

title: 🈳 Japanese “Vacancy” Button
description: This 空 character means empty and available in Japanese. This is used in the context of an empty parking space or a vacant hotel room.

title: 🌼 Blossom
description: A blossoming flower. Similar to the cherry blossom, but not necessarily the same shade. Blossom is also the name of a popular TV Show in the early 1990s.

title: 👷‍♂️ Man Construction Worker
description: The male version of the 👷 Construction Worker emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.

title: 🇪🇭 Flag: Western Sahara
description: The flag for Western Sahara, which may show as the letters EH on some platforms.

title: 🃏 Joker
description: The joker in a deck of cards, usually appearing like a court jester.

title: 🗃️ Card File Box
description: A black or gray box with a label holder, containing card index dividers with multicolored tabs, as used to organize and store files. Apple and Facebook’s designs include a lid.

title: 🇵🇪 Flag: Peru
description: The flag for Peru, which may show as the letters PE on some platforms.

title: 👨‍👨‍👦‍👦 Family: Man, Man, Boy, Boy
description: A family with two fathers, and two sons.

title: 🥎 Softball
description: A softball, which is differentiated from a baseball by size (it is larger, though hard to tell in emoji form) and color (yellow, not white).

title: 👖 Jeans
description: Denim jeans, worn by men or women. A popular form of casual trousers worn by the runner emoji in Apple's emoji artwork

title: 👩‍🎨 Woman Artist
description: The Woman Artist emoji is a sequence of the 👩 Woman and 🎨 Artist Palette emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🇬🇳 Flag: Guinea
description: The flag for Guinea, which may show as the letters GN on some platforms.

title: 🌴 Palm Tree
description: A palm tree, commonly found in tropical and otherwise warm climates. Often represents a vacation or holiday destination.

title: 🔄 Counterclockwise Arrows Button
description: Two arrows forming a circle, pointing in an anticlockwise direction. Similar to symbols sometimes used for refresh or rotate. May also be used to indicate a task is in progress.

title: 🇹🇦 Flag: Tristan Da Cunha
description: The flag for Tristan da Cunha, which may show as the letters TA on some platforms. This same flag is used for Ascension Island and St. Helena.

title: 💇 Person Getting Haircut
description: A person in the process of getting their hair cut. This emoji is intended to be gender-neutral, but is commonly shown as a girl or woman smiling, with scissors shown open next to the hair on her head.

title: 👨‍❤️‍👨 Couple With Heart: Man, Man
description: Two men standing next to each other, smiling, with a pink love heart floating in the air between them.

title: 🆎 AB Button (Blood Type)
description: A symbol representing Blood Type AB. Displayed as the letters AB on a red background.

title: 🐋 Whale
description: A large, blue whale emoji. Appears to be a humpback whale in Apple’s artwork. Distinct from the spouting whale emoji.

title: 🥰 Smiling Face With Hearts
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes, a closed smile, rosy cheeks, and several hearts floating around its head. Expresses a range of happy, affectionate feelings, especially being in love. The number of hearts (three or more) varies by platform.

title: 🇲🇨 Flag: Monaco
description: The flag for Monaco, which may show as the letters MC on some platforms.

title: 🔒 Locked
description: A locked (closed) padlock, as used to secure a latch or chain, or as an icon for a secure internet connection, private account, or locked device. Generally depicted with a gold base and silver shackle. WhatsApp’s design is silver.

title: 🛤️ Railway Track
description: Railway Track was approved as part of Unicode 7.0 in 2014 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: ⛹️‍♂️ Man Bouncing Ball
description: The male version of the ⛹ Person With Ball emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.

title: 🇹🇲 Flag: Turkmenistan
description: The flag for Turkmenistan, which may show as the letters TM on some platforms.

title: 🐀 Rat
description: A rat emoji, not to be confused with the mouse emoji.

title: 🤒 Face With Thermometer
description: A yellow face with raised or furrowed eyebrows and a thermometer in its mouth. Often depicted with red cheeks, as if feverish. May be used to represent a hospital patient or person with a cold or flu.

title: ⚙️ Gear
description: A toothed, wheel-shaped metal gear, as rotates to power machines.

title: 🇲🇽 Flag: Mexico
description: The flag for Mexico, which may show as the letters MX on some platforms.

title: 💝 Heart With Ribbon
description: A heart-shaped box, tied with a ribbon. May be a gift box, box of chocolates, or a jewellery box.

title: 1️⃣ Keycap Digit One
description: The Keycap Digit One emoji is a sequence of the 1 Digit One and ⃣ Combining Enclosing Keycap emojis. These display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🐊 Crocodile
description: A crocodile emoji, a creature often mistaken for an alligator. Displayed photorealistically on some platforms; while others show this as a cute cartoon crocodile.

title: 🎨 Artist Palette
description: A palette used by an artist when painting, to store and mix paint colors.

title: 👜 Handbag
description: A handbag, used predominantly by women to carry personal items and/or as a fashion accessory.

title: 🎸 Guitar
description: A guitar, which is mostly shown as an electric guitar and usually in generally red.

title: 🇺🇸 Flag: United States
description: The flag for the United States of America (USA), which may show as the letters US on some platforms.

title: 🏷️ Label
description: A light-brown or yellow rectangular tag, as labelled and attached to a key. Depicted at various angles punched with a hole, generally with a metal ring or loop of string.

title: ⛹️‍♀️ Woman Bouncing Ball
description: The female version of the ⛹ Person With Ball emoji.

title: 💊 Pill
description: A capsule of medicine. Generally depicted at a 45° angle, half red, half yellow. Commonly used for content concerning health, medicine, and related professions as well various types of drugs.

title: 🦅 Eagle
description: An eagle, soaring through the sky. Also the national embled for the United States.

title: 🇲🇵 Flag: Northern Mariana Islands
description: The flag for Northern Mariana Islands, which may show as the letters MP on some platforms.

title: 🤎 Brown Heart
description: Brown Heart was approved as part of Unicode 12.0 in 2019 and added to Emoji 12.0 in 2019.

title: 📄 Page Facing Up
description: A white piece of paper, its top right corner curled or dog-eared, with text printed on it, as a business letter or icon for a document on a computer. Commonly used for content concerning various types of documents and writing.

title: 🌬️ Wind Face
description: The face of a Mother Nature character, creating wind by blowing air from her mouth.

title: 👮‍♀️ Woman Police Officer
description: The female version of the 👮 Police Officer emoji.

title: 🛬 Airplane Arrival
description: A plane approaching a runway for landing. Generally displayed left-right, with the front of the plane facing toward the ground in a position that may result in a crash if attempted in the real world.

title: 🏹 Bow and Arrow
description: A bow and arrow used in the sport of archery. May also be used by cupid.

title: 🚁 Helicopter
description: A helicopter, which can hover in the air. Often seen in emergency circumstances such as transporting patients to a hospital, or for police or fire-fighting activity.

title: 💁 Person Tipping Hand
description: An information desk person, iconically represented in the Apple emoji artwork as a woman holding out her hand as if she were a waitress carrying an invisible tray of drinks.

title: 🇦🇺 Flag: Australia
description: The flag for Australia, which may show as the letters AU on some platforms.

title: 🧥 Coat
description: A winter jacket, shown in a variety of colors and styles.

title: 🚓 Police Car
description: A police car, shown with an emergency light on the top.

title: 🤔 Thinking Face
description: A yellow face with furrowed eyebrows looking upwards with thumb and index finger resting on its chin. Intended to show a person pondering or deep in thought. Often used to question or scorn something or someone, as if saying Hmm, I don't know about that. Tone varies, including earnest, playful, puzzled, skeptical, and mocking.

title: 🦸‍♀️ Woman Superhero
description: The Woman Superhero emoji is a sequence of the 🦸 Superhero and ♀ Female Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 💇‍♂️ Man Getting Haircut
description: The Man Getting Haircut emoji is a sequence of the 💇 Haircut and ♂ Male Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🚌 Bus
description: A bus used for public transport in cities and towns. Could also be used as a school bus.

title: 🙍 Person Frowning
description: An upset person, frowning with dismay. Gender is not specified, but generally shown as a woman.

title: 🇧🇻 Flag: Bouvet Island
description: The flag for Bouvet Island, which may show as the letters BV on some platforms. This is the same flag as Norway.

title: 🍲 Pot of Food
description: A pot, as a casserole dish, filled with a warm and hearty beef or vegetable stew on most platforms. Samsung’s design resembles a bowl of ramen or other noodle dish, with chopsticks. Generally used for eating and cooking (“a meal”), and commonly associated with soup or Japanese nabe.

title: 🥳 Partying Face
description: A yellow face with a party hat blowing a party horn as confetti floats around its head. Used for celebrating joyous occasions (such as New Year's Eve or World Emoji Day) and enjoying good times more generally.

title: 🌭 Hot Dog
description: The cooked sausage of a hot dog in a sliced bun and drizzled with yellow mustard, as eaten at a baseball game.

title: 🚂 Locomotive
description: A steam train, powered by coal or wood. An early type of locomotive, now mostly replaced by electric or diesel trains.

title: 😥 Sad but Relieved Face
description: A yellow face with small, open eyes, a slight frown, and furrowed eyebrows, from which a single bead of sweat drips, as if from concern or anxiety. Also known as Disappointed but Relieved Face, suggesting the smiley is upset but is grateful things didn’t turn out worse.

title: 💴 Yen Banknote
description: A banded stack of yen banknotes, the paper currency of Japan. Color and detail vary across platforms, but usually shown in green, yellow, or pink with the yen symbol, ¥. Commonly used for various content concerning money and wealth, not restricted to Japan.

title: 🥍 Lacrosse
description: Lacrosse was approved as part of Unicode 11.0 in 2018 under the name “Lacrosse Stick and Ball” and added to Emoji 11.0 in 2018.

title: 🏟️ Stadium
description: A large capacity stadium, featuring a large amount of seating for sporting fans, or people attending other shows hosted by the stadium.

title: ☎️ Telephone
description: A classic telephone, as a landline home phone. Most platforms depict a red, push-button phone with the handset on the base.

title: 💖 Sparkling Heart
description: A pink love heart with stars around it, making it look like it is sparkling or shimmering.

title: 🌅 Sunrise
description: A sun rising, early in the morning. Can be difficult to distinguish from a sunset in some versions of this artwork.

title: ◀️ Reverse Button
description: A triangle-shaped arrow, pointing left.

title: 🇹🇳 Flag: Tunisia
description: The flag for Tunisia, which may show as the letters TN on some platforms.

title: 🌰 Chestnut
description: The reddish-brown, acorn-shaped chestnut, tapering to a sharp tip from its light brown base on most platforms. A popular roasted snack associated with autumn and Christmas.

title: 🍻 Clinking Beer Mugs
description: Two frosty mugs of beer with frothy heads being clinked together, as done at a celebratory or convivial toast (“Cheers!”). Several platforms include stylized lines to mark the clinking. See also Clinking Glasses.

title: 👮‍♂️ Man Police Officer
description: The male version of the 👮 Police Officer emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.

title: 🇮🇷 Flag: Iran
description: The flag for Iran, which may show as the letters IR on some platforms.

title: 📊 Bar Chart
description: A bar graph generally showing three different-colored, vertical rectangles at various heights, as compares values across a category. Commonly used to represent various types of data, information, facts, figures, and charts more generally.

title: 🆓 Free Button
description: The word free, shown enclosed in a square.

title: 💂‍♀️ Woman Guard
description: The female version of the 💂 Guardsman emoji.

title: 🛸 Flying Saucer
description: A flying saucer, sometimes referred to as an Unidentified Flying Object (UFO). Shown on some platforms with an alien at the controls and/or a beam of light emitting from the base.

title: 🤛 Left-Facing Fist
description: A fist pointing left, which may be used in conjunction with the right-facing fist to complete a fist-bump gesture.

title: 🍱 Bento Box
description: A Japanese bento, a lunch box divided into portions of rice, vegetables, and meat or seafood, such as sushi or fried shrimp.

title: 🤾‍♀️ Woman Playing Handball
description: The Woman Playing Handball emoji is a sequence of the 🤾 Handball and ♀ Female Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🍊 Tangerine
description: An orange-colored citrus fruit with a green leaf or leaves and stem. Officially depicting a tangerine, a type of mandarin (mikan in Japan). Often used as a garden-variety orange. Either way, a good source of vitamin C.

title: 🙍‍♀️ Woman Frowning
description: The female version of the 🙍 Person Frowning emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.

title: 👃 Nose
description: A human nose. May be used to indicate smelling, or something that smells.

title: 👩‍🦰 Woman: Red Hair
description: A woman with red hair. Sometimes described as ginger, orange, copper, or auburn.

title: 🍀 Four Leaf Clover
description: A four-leaf clover is a less common variety of the three-leaved clover. Considered to be lucky.

title: 🔱 Trident Emblem
description: A trident is a three-pronged spear, that appears similar to a pitchfork. Often held by Greek or Roman Gods in statues.

title: 👩‍🎤 Woman Singer
description: A woman singer or rock star generally displayed with a microphone, and sometimes musical notes.

title: 🇬🇲 Flag: Gambia
description: The flag for Gambia, which may show as the letters GM on some platforms.

title: 🤲 Palms Up Together
description: Two hands held out together with open palms facing up, in a slightly cupped manner.

title: 📲 Mobile Phone With Arrow
description: A mobile phone (cell phone) with a rightward arrow pointed at it from the left. Intended to indicate an incoming call or message, but used to represent mobile phones, technology, and communication more generally.

title: 🚊 Tram
description: A form of public transport on rails, usually found on streets in cities or other urban areas. For short or medium-length journeys.

title: ⏰ Alarm Clock
description: A timepiece set in advance to startle a person awake at the designated time with its two bells. That is, before hitting snooze. Appearance varies across platforms, but depicted as a classic, wind-up, bedside alarm clock, often red in color.

title: 🇸🇿 Flag: Swaziland
description: The flag for Swaziland, which may show as the letters SZ on some platforms.

title: 🤠 Cowboy Hat Face
description: Yee-haw! A yellow smiley wearing a wide-brimmed, brown-leather cowboy hat. Its smile varies across platforms. May convey a sense of exuberance, whimsy, confidence, adventure, or other sentiments.

title: 🇧🇾 Flag: Belarus
description: The flag for Belarus, which may show as the letters BY on some platforms.

title: 👄 Mouth
description: A human mouth which is generally displayed as a pair of lips and a top row of teeth, instead of the inside of the mouth.

title: 🤟 Love-You Gesture
description: The gesture for “I love you” in American Sign Language, shown as a raised pinky (little) finger, index finger, and an extended thumb.

title: 📡 Satellite Antenna
description: A dish antenna, as used to send or receive information to or from a communication satellite—or 👽 Extraterrestrial Life. Generally depicted as a mounted, metal dish with its antenna positioned at 45° to the upper right.

title: 🦸‍♂️ Man Superhero
description: The Man Superhero emoji is a sequence of the 🦸 Superhero and ♂ Male Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🌹 Rose
description: A single red rose emoji. Sometimes used as a display of romance, or for their pleasant smell.

title: ❄️ Snowflake
description: Snow falling to the ground in the form of a unique ❄ snowflake. With enough snow, a snowman can be made!

title: 🙁 Slightly Frowning Face
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and a slight frown. Often conveys a mild degree of concern, disappointment, or sadness, but usually less intensely than ☹️ Frowning Face.

title: 🖊️ Pen
description: A blue or black ballpoint pen, as used for everyday writing. Depicted with its cap removed onto its end or as retractable pen. Positioned at a 45° angle, its tip at the lower left. Commonly used for various content concerning writing (e.g., creative, professional) as well as signing (deals, laws, in sports).

title: 🙏 Folded Hands
description: Two hands placed firmly together, meaning please or thank you in Japanese culture. A common alternative use for this emoji is for prayer, using the same gesture as praying hands. Less-common: a high-five.

title: 🤱 Breast-Feeding
description: A woman breastfeeding a child. This emoji supports skin tone modifiers, which apply to the mother.

title: 🤹‍♀️ Woman Juggling
description: The Woman Juggling emoji is a sequence of the 🤹 Juggling and ♀ Female Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 😆 Grinning Squinting Face
description: A yellow face with a broad, open smile and scrunched, X-shaped eyes. Often conveys excitement or hearty laughter.

title: ⛵ Sailboat
description: A sailboat, otherwise known as a sailing boat or yacht.  Uses wind as the source of propulsion to move around a body of water.

title: 🇼🇸 Flag: Samoa
description: The flag for Samoa, which may show as the letters WS on some platforms.

title: 🔙 Back Arrow
description: Back Arrow was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name “Back With Leftwards Arrow Above” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🔑 Key
description: A key, as opens a door or lock. Depicted at a 45° angle as a gold, bronze, or copper key with a round head and notched blade. Commonly used for figurative senses of key, e.g., the key to success, being key ("crucial").

title: ⏬ Fast Down Button
description: Two triangles pointing down. Similar to rewind icon, rotated 90° counter-clockwise.

title: 🏌️‍♂️ Man Golfing
description: The male version of the 🏌 Golfer emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.

title: 😒 Unamused Face
description: A yellow face with slightly raised eyebrows, a frown, and eyes looking to the side. May convey a variety of negative emotions, including irritation, displeasure, grumpiness, and skepticism, as if giving the side-eye.

title: 📰 Newspaper
description: The front page of a newspaper, as people once read the news before the internet. Commonly used for various content concerning news, media, and journalism as well as personal news.

title: ✝️ Latin Cross
description: A latin cross, otherwise known as a Christian cross. This cross symbol is often used as a symbol of Christianity. Similar in appearance to the Orthodox cross.

title: 🇵🇦 Flag: Panama
description: The flag for Panama, which may show as the letters PA on some platforms.

title: 🐛 Bug
description: An insect, which appears to be a caterpillar in Apple’s Artwork, and a centipede or millipede in the Google and Microsoft versions.

title: 🚋 Tram Car
description: A form of public transport on rails, usually found on streets in cities or other urban areas. For short or medium-length journeys.

title: 🤫 Shushing Face
description: A yellow face placing an index finger over pursed lips, as if issuing Shh! or Shush! for silence. Some platforms feature raised eyebrows. Apple’s design suggests the face is tilting back slightly.

title: 🇲🇳 Flag: Mongolia
description: The flag for Mongolia, which may show as the letters MN on some platforms.

title: 🤘 Sign of the Horns
description: A "rock on" hand gesture raising the pinky and index fingers on one hand, which a variety of other meanings.

title: 🇸🇰 Flag: Slovakia
description: The flag for Slovakia, which may show as the letters SK on some platforms.

title: 💗 Growing Heart
description: A pink heart, inside a slightly larger pink heart, inside a larger-again pink heart. Intended to give the impression of a heart increasing in size.

title: 👞 Man’s Shoe
description: A shoe worn by a man, to work, dinner, or another occasion that requires footwear. Unlike womens shoes, this shoe is likely to be comfortable.

title: 👩‍👦‍👦 Family: Woman, Boy, Boy
description: The Family: Woman, Boy, Boy emoji is a sequence of the 👩 Woman, 👦 Boy and 👦 Boy emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 📚 Books
description: A loose stack of three of more different-colored, hardcover books. Commonly used for various content concerning reading and schooling. Color and orientation vary across platforms, but often shown with red, green, and blue covers.

title: 🦹‍♀️ Woman Supervillain
description: The Woman Supervillain emoji is a sequence of the 🦹 Supervillain and ♀ Female Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🇵🇭 Flag: Philippines
description: The flag for Philippines, which may show as the letters PH on some platforms.

title: 🕡 Six-Thirty
description: Six-Thirty was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name “Clock Face Six-Thirty” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🔠 Input Latin Uppercase
description: A symbol showing the capital letters A, B, C and D. Intended to be used on a software keyboard, or other input screen to toggle capital letter input.

title: 💕 Two Hearts
description: Two pink love hearts. One larger than the other. Can be used to display that “love is in the air”.

title: 🚑 Ambulance
description: An ambulance, used to transport patients between their home and the hospital.

title: 🐐 Goat
description: A goat, displayed in white, gray, or brown depending on platform. Often used in relation to the phrase Greatest Of All Time (G.O.A.T.).

title: 😤 Face With Steam From Nose
description: A yellow face with closed eyes, furrowed eyebrows, broad frown, and two puffs of steam blowing out of its nose, as if in a huff or fuming.

title: 👨‍👩‍👦‍👦 Family: Man, Woman, Boy, Boy
description: A family with a father, mother, and two sons.

title: 🌸 Cherry Blossom
description: A pretty, light-pink flower in bloom. The cherry blossom is very popular in Japan and Japanese art. Weather forecasts track the cherry blossom front across Japan each year.

title: 😹 Cat Face With Tears of Joy
description: A cartoon cat variant of 😂 Face With Tears of Joy. Depicted as yellow on major platforms.

title: 🔕 Bell With Slash
description: A gold or yellow bell with a red line through it, which is commonly used on mobile phones as an icon for the silencing of notifications or ringing sounds. A mute, or silent mode.

title: 🥟 Dumpling
description: A dumpling of dough and filling, as folded and pinched closed for steaming or frying. Associated with cuisines around the world, including China (jiaozi), Japan (gyoza or dango), Poland (pierogi), and Spain and Latin America (empanada). Facebook's design resembles a xiaolongbao, a Chinese soup dumpling.

title: 📐 Triangular Ruler
description: A triangle or set square, as used by engineers or architects to draw straight lines at angles. Variously depicted as a metal, wood, or plastic right triangle with length markings, its hypotenuse to the right.

title: 👺 Goblin
description: A menacing, red mask featuring a grotesquely long nose, angry eyes, and bushy eyebrows and mustache. Depicts a tengu, a proud trickster figure in Japanese folklore.

title: 🦒 Giraffe
description: Giraffe was approved as part of Unicode 10.0 in 2017 under the name “Giraffe Face” and added to Emoji 5.0 in 2017.

title: 😛 Face With Tongue
description: A yellow face with small, open eyes and a big grin, playfully sticking out its tongue. Can variously convey a sense of fun, excitement, silliness, cuteness, happiness, or jesting, as if saying Just kidding!

title: 🇳🇫 Flag: Norfolk Island
description: The flag for Norfolk Island, which may show as the letters NF on some platforms.

title: 🇵🇹 Flag: Portugal
description: The flag for Portugal, which may show as the letters PT on some platforms.

title: 🇬🇮 Flag: Gibraltar
description: The flag for Gibraltar, which may show as the letters GI on some platforms.

title: 🇰🇾 Flag: Cayman Islands
description: The flag for Cayman Islands, which may show as the letters KY on some platforms.

title: ▫️ White Small Square
description: White Small Square was approved as part of Unicode 1.1 in 1993 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 👩‍👦 Family: Woman, Boy
description: The Family: Woman, Boy emoji is a sequence of the 👩 Woman and 👦 Boy emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🇩🇲 Flag: Dominica
description: The flag for Dominica, which may show as the letters DM on some platforms.

title: 👨‍🔧 Man Mechanic
description: The Man Mechanic emoji is a sequence of the 👨 Man and 🔧 Wrench emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: ⚪ White Circle
description: White Circle was approved as part of Unicode 4.1 in 2005 under the name “Medium White Circle” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🙋 Person Raising Hand
description: A person with its hand in the air, as if it wants to ask or answer a question.

title: 💁‍♀️ Woman Tipping Hand
description: The female version of the 💁 Information Desk Person emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.

title: 💳 Credit Card
description: The backside of a credit card, showing the magnetic strip and signature. Color and detail vary across platforms, but often shown as gold, silver, or blue. May be used for banking and other ID cards as well for various content concerning money, including payment.

title: 🕵️‍♂️ Man Detective
description: The male version of the 🕵 Sleuth or Spy emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.

title: 🍩 Doughnut
description: A chocolate-glazed donut (or doughnut) with rainbow sprinkles. WhatsApp features a pink glaze associated with The Simpsons. May resemble the Bagel at small sizes.

title: 📀 DVD
description: A digital versatile disc (DVD), a type of optical disc used to play movies before the rise of streaming technology. Generally depicted in gold, though Facebook’s is bluish gray, as a Blu-ray.

title: 🥀 Wilted Flower
description: A flower that has died, or wilted due to a lack of water. A petal falls toward the ground.

title: 🥗 Green Salad
description: An undressed garden salad in a bowl with leafy-green lettuce and other ingredients such as tomato, red onion, and black olives. Commonly associated with healthy eating and living.

title: 🔼 Upwards Button
description: A triangle-shaped arrow, pointing up. Styled similarly to the left and right pointing triangles on iOS, but shown in red on Windows, and orange on Android.

title: ✳️ Eight-Spoked Asterisk
description: Used in a similar manner to a regular * asterisk character but tends to be shown in a similar vertical alignment to a • bullet point. The eight spoked asterisk has both a ✳︎ text and ✳️ emoji presentation available on most platforms.

title: 🚇 Metro
description: A metro: frequent underground train found in built-up areas with high populations.

title: 🏩 Love Hotel
description: A love hotel is a hotel that can be hired by the hour instead of as accommodation for the evening.

title: 🚷 No Pedestrians
description: A pedestrian symbol with a red stroke through it, indicating that pedestrians are prohibited from this location.

title: 🇫🇰 Flag: Falkland Islands
description: The flag for Falkland Islands (Malvinas), which may show as the letters FK on some platforms.

title: 🛫 Airplane Departure
description: A plane taking off from a runway. Generally displayed left-right, with the front of the plane elevated.

title: 🍉 Watermelon
description: A slice of watermelon, showing its rich pink flesh, black seeds, and green rind.

title: 🚿 Shower
description: A silver shower head, streaming water to the left. Pressure level varies across platforms. 🧼 Soap not provided.

title: 🇨🇺 Flag: Cuba
description: The flag for Cuba, which may show as the letters CU on some platforms.

title: 🍘 Rice Cracker
description: A Japanese senbei, or rice cracker, wrapped with a sheet of nori, or seaweed, a snack commonly enjoyed with green tea.

title: 🇳🇦 Flag: Namibia
description: The flag for Namibia, which may show as the letters NA on some platforms.

title: 🏂 Snowboarder
description: A person snowboarding downhill at a ski resort. Wearing clothing designed for cold climates.

title: 🥣 Bowl With Spoon
description: A bowl with a silver spoon inside, as used to eat cereal or soup. Bowl color varies across platforms, as do contents. Android depicts breakfast cereal, WhatsApp tomato soup; Apple’s is empty.

title: 📕 Closed Book
description: A closed, hardcover book, depicted with a red, front-facing cover on most platforms. Commonly used for various content concerning reading, writing, learning, and schooling. May also be used as a red accent color.

title: 🇦🇼 Flag: Aruba
description: The flag for Aruba, which may show as the letters AW on some platforms.

title: 📨 Incoming Envelope
description: The back of an envelope, shown coming into an inbox or arriving with motion lines.

title: ✨ Sparkles
description: Decorative sparkling stars, the kind that may be indicate an item as being ‘sparkling clean’ (very clean) or shiny. Often used as a means of highlighting something positive or exciting.

title: ♑ Capricorn
description: The Capricorn astrological sign in the Zodiac. This Zodiac Symbol represents a Goat.

title: 🐾 Paw Prints
description: Paw prints left by a dog or cat, possibly after wandering through paint.

title: 😿 Crying Cat Face
description: A cartoon cat variant of 😢 Crying Face. Depicted as yellow on major platforms.

title: 🇮🇩 Flag: Indonesia
description: The flag for Indonesia, which may show as the letters ID on some platforms.

title: ⚖️ Balance Scale
description: A balance scale, as historically used to measure weight. A symbol of justice, as held by Lady Justice, and of the zodiac sign of Libra, the Scales. Depicted as two silver or gold pans suspended from a beam and supported on a base.

title: 🎄 Christmas Tree
description: A decorated Christmas Tree emoji: a pine tree displayed at Christmas time adorned with lights, tinsel and other ornaments. Generally displayed with a star on top. See also: Christmas emoji list.

title: ↖️ Up-Left Arrow
description: An arrow pointing diagonally in an up-left, or north-west direction.

title: 🥐 Croissant
description: The flaky, golden-brown crescent of a croissant, a breakfast pastry associated with France and Austria.

title: 🇪🇷 Flag: Eritrea
description: The flag for Eritrea, which may show as the letters ER on some platforms.

title: 🤾 Person Playing Handball
description: Person Playing Handball was approved as part of Unicode 9.0 in 2016 under the name “Handball” and added to Emoji 3.0 in 2016.

title: 🛢️ Oil Drum
description: A barrel for transporting bulk liquids, such as oil. Generally depicted as a red or blue metal drum with holes or a stopper on its lid. Commonly used for various content concerning petroleum or hazardous waste.

title: 🛂 Passport Control
description: A person checking passports at an international border.

title: 🇨🇱 Flag: Chile
description: The flag for Chile, which may show as the letters CL on some platforms.

title: 🇬🇵 Flag: Guadeloupe
description: The flag for Guadeloupe, which may show as the letters GP on some platforms.

title: 👻 Ghost
description: Boo! A white, cartoon ghost making a silly face. Its tongue is stuck out and arms are outstretched, as if trying to scare someone in a friendly way. Several platforms feature one larger, bulging eye.

title: ⛺ Tent
description: A tent, used for protection from wind and rain when camping. Often shown at night time, under stars.

title: 🗝️ Old Key
description: An old-fashioned key, as opens an antique chest or wardrobe. Generally depicted at a 45° angle as a tarnished, silver skeleton key with an ornate, bowed head and two-toothed bit at the bottom left.

title: 🐺 Wolf Face
description: A wolf shown with gray fur, black nose, and pointed ears on most platforms.

title: 😂 Face With Tears of Joy
description: A yellow face with a big grin, uplifted eyebrows, and smiling eyes, each shedding a tear from laughing so hard. Widely used to show something is funny or pleasing.

title: 🙉 Hear-No-Evil Monkey
description: One of the three wise monkeys, known as Kikazaru.

title: 😎 Smiling Face With Sunglasses
description: A yellow face with a broad, closed smile wearing black sunglasses, as if a pair of classic Wayfarers. Often used to convey the slang sense of cool. May also express a confident, carefree attitude or that something is excellent.

title: 🤽 Person Playing Water Polo
description: A person shown in water with a ball, playing the sport of water polo.

title: 🍷 Wine Glass
description: Red wine served in a stemmed glass. Google previously displayed an orange-colored drink that resembled cognac.

title: 🙇 Person Bowing
description: A person bowing deeply which is known as dogeza in Japan. Used to express a sincere apology, or to request a large favour.

title: 🗼 Tokyo Tower
description: The Tokyo Tower is the second-tallest building in Japan, located in Minato, Tokyo.

title: 🔁 Repeat Button
description: Circular arrows pointing in a clockwise direction. Used in music player applications to loop a track or album continuously.

title: 🌛 First Quarter Moon Face
description: A crescent moon shape, showing a face looking left.

title: ❎ Cross Mark Button
description: Cross Mark Button was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name “Negative Squared Cross Mark” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🐶 Dog Face
description: The face of a dog, showing both eyes, both ears, nose and mouth. Shows the face of a dog smiling, with eyes open and tongue hanging out.

title: 🇰🇿 Flag: Kazakhstan
description: The flag for Kazakhstan, which may show as the letters KZ on some platforms.

title: 🇼🇫 Flag: Wallis & Futuna
description: The Flag: Wallis & Futuna emoji is a sequence of the 🇼 Regional Indicator Symbol Letter W and 🇫 Regional Indicator Symbol Letter F emojis. These display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🐁 Mouse
description: A small white mouse shown full-body, as opposed to the mouse face emoji.

title: 👂 Ear
description: A single human ear. May be used in the context of listening, or hearing something.

title: 🇧🇩 Flag: Bangladesh
description: The flag for Bangladesh, which may show as the letters BD on some platforms.

title: 🎷 Saxophone
description: Saxophone was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🎀 Ribbon
description: A pink or red ribbon, as tied into a bow on a gift or woman's hat.

title: 🚐 Minibus
description: A small bus or minivan designed to carry fewer people than a full-sized bus. Displayed in white on most platforms (green on Facebook).

title: 🛑 Stop Sign
description: A red, octagonal sign. Used in many countries as a stop sign.

title: 🎵 Musical Note
description: A music note emoji, which can denote song lyrics, or other music related topics.

title: 🌯 Burrito
description: A Mexican or Tex-Mex burrito, featuring a wrapped flour tortilla filled with such ingredients as beef, rice, beans, cheese, tomato, lettuce, and sour cream. Served in foil on several major platforms, suggesting a Mission burrito associated with San Francisco. Not to be confused with the Stuffed Flatbread.

title: 🥧 Pie
description: A baked dish with a pastry crust, filled with sweet or savory ingredients. Appearance widely varies by platform. Apple depicts a whole pie in a tin, its crimped crust scored to let out steam. Google shows a slice of pumpkin pie as served at Thanksgiving, WhatsApp and Twitter a slice of cherry pie.

title: 👨‍🦱 Man: Curly Hair
description: The Man: Curly Hair emoji is a sequence of the 👨 Man and 🦱 Emoji Component Curly Hair emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🖕 Middle Finger
description: A middle finger emoji, used in some western cultures as a rude or insulting gesture. The back of the hand is shown with the middle finger raised.

title: ⏫ Fast Up Button
description: Two triangles pointing up. Similar to rewind icon, rotated 90° clockwise.

title: 🇨🇰 Flag: Cook Islands
description: The flag for Cook Islands, which may show as the letters CK on some platforms.

title: 🔹 Small Blue Diamond
description: Small Blue Diamond was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🇰🇪 Flag: Kenya
description: The flag for Kenya, which may show as the letters KE on some platforms.

title: 🌷 Tulip
description: A single tulip emoji. Commonly seen at tulip festivals in locations around the world with a dutch heritage.

title: 🔻 Red Triangle Pointed Down
description: Red Triangle Pointed Down was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010  under the name “Down-Pointing Red Triangle” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🎬 Clapper Board
description: A board which contains the scene name, number, and film. A person ‘claps’ the board shut at the top while saying “Action” or “Cut” to indicate the start and stop of a scene that is being filmed.

title: 😌 Relieved Face
description: A yellow face with soft, closed eyes, raised eyebrows, and a slight smile. Facebook’s design features a slightly open mouth, as if sighing.

title: 🈶 Japanese “Not Free of Charge” Button
description: This emoji means to own or posses.

title: 🇦🇲 Flag: Armenia
description: The flag for Armenia, which may show as the letters AM on some platforms.

title: ⬇️ Down Arrow
description: An arrow, pointing down.

title: 🎑 Moon Viewing Ceremony
description: Moon Viewing Ceremonies (called Tsukimi in Japan) are held each year in autumn to celebrate the full moon and waxing moon in Japan.

title: 🎪 Circus Tent
description: A circular ‘big top’ circus tent, with a triangle flag on top.

title: 🆚 Vs Button
description: Vs Button was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name “Squared Vs” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🚽 Toilet
description: A white toilet, as used to deposit a 💩 Pile of Poo. (Don’t forget the 🧻 Roll of Paper.) Most platforms depict a porcelain toilet in profile, bowl facing to the left.

title: 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁷󠁬󠁳󠁿 Flag: Wales
description: The flag for Wales, a country in the United Kingdom. May show as the letters gbwls.

title: 🇹🇷 Flag: Turkey
description: The flag for Turkey, which may show as the letters TR on some platforms.

title: Ⓜ️ Circled M
description: The letter M in a circle, commonly used in to identify a Metro (subway, underground train) station in a city area.

title: ➿ Double Curly Loop
description: Two curly loops, which represent a reel-to-reel tape recorder. Used as a symbol for voicemail on many phones.

title: 🚣 Person Rowing Boat
description: A small rowboat suitable for a small number of people. Couples or families sometimes hire these as an activity on calm waters.

title: 🇮🇨 Flag: Canary Islands
description: The flag for Canary Islands, which may show as the letters IC on some platforms.

title: 🎲 Game Die
description: A six-sided die, used in a range of board and turn-based games. Commonly called dice which refers to the plural of die.

title: ♏ Scorpio
description: The Scorpius astrological sign in the Zodiac. This Zodiac Symbol represents a Scorpion.

title: 🧡 Orange Heart
description: Orange Heart was approved as part of Unicode 10.0 in 2017 and added to Emoji 5.0 in 2017.

title: 🇨🇽 Flag: Christmas Island
description: The flag for Christmas Island, which may show as the letters CX on some platforms.

title: 😙 Kissing Face With Smiling Eyes
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes and puckered lips giving a kiss. Commonly conveys sentiments of love and affection.

title: 😳 Flushed Face
description: A yellow face with raised eyebrows, a small, closed mouth, wide, white eyes staring straight ahead, and blushing cheeks. Intended to depict such feelings as embarrassment, but meaning very widely varies. Other senses include flattery, surprise, disbelief, admiration, affection, and excitement.

title: 🇨🇴 Flag: Colombia
description: The flag for Colombia, which may show as the letters CO on some platforms.

title: 🦚 Peacock
description: Peacock was approved as part of Unicode 11.0 in 2018 and added to Emoji 11.0 in 2018.

title: 📌 Pushpin
description: A thumbtack (drawing pin), as used to pin documents on a bulletin (notice) board. Depicted at a 45° angle with its red, flat head to the upper right.

title: 🇸🇻 Flag: El Salvador
description: The flag for El Salvador, which may show as the letters SV on some platforms.

title: 😖 Confounded Face
description: A yellow face with scrunched, X-shaped eyes and a crumpled mouth, as if quivering in frustration or holding back tears. May be used to represent being overcome with various emotions, including irritation, frustration, disgust, and sadness, as if to the point of defeat.

title: 🇭🇰 Flag: Hong Kong SAR China
description: The flag for Hong Kong, which may show as the letters HK on some platforms.

title: 📫 Closed Mailbox With Raised Flag
description: A curbside mailbox (letterbox, postbox) with its door latched shut and signal flag raised. Generally depicted in blue or gray with a red flag. Used for various content concerning postal deliveries and email.

title: #️⃣ Keycap Number Sign
description: A hash key, sometimes referred to as a pound key in the United States. Most commonly used online to make a hashtag (or hash flag) on social media sites.

title: 🥏 Flying Disc
description: A flying disc, more commonly known as a frisbee. Used in the sport of Ultimate or disc golf.

title: 5️⃣ Keycap Digit Five
description: The Keycap Digit Five emoji is a sequence of the 5 Digit Five and ⃣ Combining Enclosing Keycap emojis. These display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🇸🇽 Flag: Sint Maarten
description: The flag for Sint Maarten, which may show as the letters SX on some platforms. This is the Dutch half of the of the Caribbean island of Saint Martin. Not to be confused with St. Martin, the French half of the same island.

title: ✉️ Envelope
description: The back of an envelope, as used to send a letter or card in the mail (post). Generally depicted in white, though Google’s design is yellow. Used for various content concerning mail and messages, including email.

title: 💫 Dizzy
description: A symbol used in comics or other visual mediums, indicating that a person is dizzy.

title: 🇧🇯 Flag: Benin
description: The flag for Benin, which may show as the letters BJ on some platforms.

title: 🇲🇷 Flag: Mauritania
description: The flag for Mauritania, which may show as the letters MR on some platforms. This design changed in August 2017, adding a red band at the top and bottom.

title: 🧘‍♀️ Woman in Lotus Position
description: The Woman in Lotus Position emoji is a sequence of the 🧘 Person in Lotus Position and ♀ Female Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🧸 Teddy Bear
description: A classic teddy bear, as snuggled by a child when going to sleep.

title: 🦎 Lizard
description: A small lizard, shown in green or brown colors, often from above.

title: 🐣 Hatching Chick
description: A cute baby chicken hatching from its egg and seeing the world for the first time.

title: 📩 Envelope With Arrow
description: The back of envelope with a down arrow on top. Generally depicted in white (except for Google’s yellow design) with a red or blue arrow.

title: 📇 Card Index
description: A card index, as a Rolodex, once used to organize and access cards containing the information of personal or business contacts. Depicted as a black or gray rotating device with a contact card displayed, including a graphic and text.

title: ☄️ Comet
description: A streaking comet, appearing as a ball of light, with a light streak behind it. Similar to the shooting star emoji.

title: 🤥 Lying Face
description: A yellow face with raised eyebrows, enlarged eyes, slight frown, and long nose, indicating it’s telling a lie in the manner of Pinocchio. Like that character, Facebook's design features a wooden nose.

title: 💆 Person Getting Massage
description: A person getting his or her face massaged.

title: ®️ Registered
description: Registered was approved as part of Unicode 1.1 in 1993 under the name “Registered Sign” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 👩‍🚀 Woman Astronaut
description: A female astronaut or cosmonaut shown wearing a space suit and helmet.

title: 🇧🇮 Flag: Burundi
description: The flag for Burundi, which may show as the letters BI on some platforms.

title: 🕛 Twelve O’Clock
description: Twelve O’Clock was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name “Clock Face Twelve O’Clock” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🌍 Globe Showing Europe-Africa
description: The world, showing Europe and Africa.

title: 🇸🇦 Flag: Saudi Arabia
description: The flag for Saudi Arabia, which may show as the letters SA on some platforms.

title: 👨‍👨‍👦 Family: Man, Man, Boy
description: A family with two fathers, and one son.

title: 🚃 Railway Car
description: A railway (railroad) car (carriage) that is generally pulled along a railway line by a locomotive. Shown with a pantograph above the carriage on many platforms which makes it look more like a tram car.

title: 🇨🇼 Flag: Curaçao
description: The flag for Curaçao, which may show as the letters CW on some platforms.

title: 🏐 Volleyball
description: A volleyball emoji, showing the round ball used in the sport. Played as part of the Summer Olympic Games.

title: 🇿🇦 Flag: South Africa
description: The flag for South Africa, which may show as the letters ZA on some platforms.

title: 🙍‍♂️ Man Frowning
description: The male version of the 🙍 Person Frowning emoji.

title: 🇸🇧 Flag: Solomon Islands
description: The flag for Solomon Islands, which may show as the letters SB on some platforms.

title: 🍂 Fallen Leaf
description: A fallen leaf (or leaves), as would be seen in the season of fall or autumn.

title: 🏥 Hospital
description: A place where people are taken to receive medical care. This hospital has a large red cross on the front, often used as a symbol for health care.

title: 🇵🇬 Flag: Papua New Guinea
description: The flag for Papua New Guinea, which may show as the letters PG on some platforms.

title: 🌘 Waning Crescent Moon
description: Waning Crescent Moon was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name “Waning Crescent Moon Symbol” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🇸🇾 Flag: Syria
description: The flag for Syria, which may show as the letters SY on some platforms.

title: 💚 Green Heart
description: A green heart emoji.

title: 🈷️ Japanese “Monthly Amount” Button
description: CJK Ideographs are characters used in Chinese, Japanese and Korean languages. Their writing systems all completely or partly use Chinese characters.

title: 👨‍🚀 Man Astronaut
description: A male astronaut or cosmonaut shown wearing a space suit and helmet.

title: 🦁 Lion Face
description: The face of a lion, often referred to as the king of the jungle. Displays with a cute, cartoon-style face in Apple's artwork that appears to be slightly sad, or timid. Also available as an Animoji on iOS.

title: 🇸🇬 Flag: Singapore
description: The flag for Singapore, which may show as the letters SG on some platforms.

title: ☦️ Orthodox Cross
description: Orthodox Cross was approved as part of Unicode 1.1 in 1993 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 💌 Love Letter
description: The back of an envelope, generally shown in white and sealed with a red heart. Represents a love letter or note, valentine, or affectionate greeting card. Commonly used to convey various feelings or messages of love and happiness.

title: 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿 Flag: Scotland
description: The flag for Scotland, a country in the United Kingdom. May show as the letters gbsct.

title: 🧾 Receipt
description: A white paper receipt, as proof of payment, and shown flat or curled. May be used for other financial documents (e.g., invoice, tax form). May also be used for the slang receipts, or "evidence” or “confirmation” of some feat or controversy.

title: 🌦️ Sun Behind Rain Cloud
description: Raindrops falling from a cloud, with the sun shown in the background (half covered by the cloud). The combination of sun and rain may cause a rainbow to appear in the sky.

title: 👕 T-Shirt
description: A plain t-shirt, that can be worn by men or women. Displayed as a blue polo shirt on iOS, Facebook and Firefox OS. A white t-shirt on Android and Windows, and yellow or green on other platforms.

title: 🇫🇯 Flag: Fiji
description: The flag for Fiji, which may show as the letters FJ on some platforms.

title: 🧜 Merperson
description: A merperson who may be referred to as merfolk or merpeople in plural. May be used for the display of a mermaid, mergirl, merwoman, or merman.

title: 🇪🇹 Flag: Ethiopia
description: The flag for Ethiopia, which may show as the letters ET on some platforms.

title: 👨‍🏫 Man Teacher
description: A man standing in front of a chalkboard (aka blackboard) with the intention of teaching a class.

title: 🍝 Spaghetti
description: A plate of Italian spaghetti with tomato sauce, as a bolognese, with a fork twirling its long, thin noodles. Garnished with a green herb, as parsley, on some platforms.

title: 🐿️ Chipmunk
description: A chipmunk emoji, which looks similar to a squirrel. Shown in brown, with a bushy tail. Often shown eating an acorn or chestnut.

title: 🇨🇮 Flag: Côte d’Ivoire
description: The Flag: Côte d’Ivoire emoji is a sequence of the 🇨 Regional Indicator Symbol Letter C and 🇮 Regional Indicator Symbol Letter I emojis. These display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🌕 Full Moon
description: A full moon, unobstructed by any shadow cast from the earth. Also said to be the time that werewolves move amongst us.

title: 🥭 Mango
description: The ripe fruit of a tropical mango. Variously depicted in shades of yellow, red, orange, and green with a single, green leaf and stem.

title: 💶 Euro Banknote
description: A banded stack of euro banknotes, the paper currency of the European Union (EU). Color and detail vary across platforms, but shown with the euro sign, €. Commonly used for various content concerning wealth and money, not restricted to the EU.

title: 🤓 Nerd Face
description: A yellow face smiling with thick, black-rimmed eyeglasses and buck teeth on most platforms. Styled after a stereotypical nerd, with buck teeth a racist caricature historically mocking East Asians. Some feature white-taped glasses, another nerd trope. Smile and glasses vary across platforms.

title: 🇨🇿 Flag: Czechia
description: The flag for Czechia, which may show as the letters CZ on some platforms. This was formerly known as Czech Republic.

title: 🏁 Chequered Flag
description: A flag with black and white squares shown in a checkerboard pattern, used to signal the start or end of a motor car race.

title: 👩‍⚕️ Woman Health Worker
description: A woman working in the field of health care. This may be used to represent a doctor, nurse, or pharmacist.

title: 🥋 Martial Arts Uniform
description: A white uniform used in marital arts such as judo or karate. Held together using a material belt. Known as keikogi in Japanese.

title: 🔝 Top Arrow
description: The word "top" with an arrow pointing up above it.

title: 🖲️ Trackball
description: A trackball, as rotated to control a cursor on a computer. An alternative or supplement to a computer mouse or touchpad. Generally depicted as a cordless device with a blue or red ball in a cylindrical, black or gray socket.

title: 🏛️ Classical Building
description: Classical Building was approved as part of Unicode 7.0 in 2014 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: ♟️ Chess Pawn
description: Chess Pawn was approved as part of Unicode 1.1 in 1993 under the name “Black Chess Pawn” and added to Emoji 11.0 in 2018.

title: 🇧🇫 Flag: Burkina Faso
description: The flag for Burkina Faso, which may show as the letters BF on some platforms.

title: 🚶‍♂️ Man Walking
description: The male version of the 🚶 Pedestrian emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.

title: 🦹 Supervillain
description: A villain which may be displayed as a man,woman or gender-neutral / gender-inclusive depending on the platform. This base emoji does not specify a gender, but is used to create the emojis for Man Supervillain and Woman Supervillain.

title: 🌙 Crescent Moon
description: A crescent moon shown in yellow on most platforms.

title: 🤪 Zany Face
description: A smiley making a silly face. A yellow face with a big grin and wide, white eyes, one larger than the other and in a wild, cockeyed expression. Many platforms, including Apple, depict its tongue stuck out and head tilted; others feature a full-toothed grin, giving it a more unhinged appearance.

title: 🤹‍♂️ Man Juggling
description: The Man Juggling emoji is a sequence of the 🤹 Juggling and ♂ Male Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🐼 Panda Face
description: The head of a panda, shown to be smiling on some platforms. Displayed in black and white, with some shades in between. Also available as an Animoji on iOS.

title: 🇱🇻 Flag: Latvia
description: The flag for Latvia, which may show as the letters LV on some platforms.

title: 👩‍🍳 Woman Cook
description: The Woman Cook emoji is a sequence of the 👩 Woman and 🍳 Cooking emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🤶 Mrs. Claus
description: Mother Christmas, more commonly known as Mrs. Claus, is the wife of Santa Claus. Displayed as an older woman with glasses and a festive red and white bonnet. See also: Christmas emoji list.

title: 🔥 Fire
description: A small flame, mostly yellow but red at the top. Can be used to describe something or someone being hot, or in the context of being exemplary (lit, slang).

title: 🥾 Hiking Boot
description: A style of boot commonly worn on long walks or for hiking. Generally distinct from other footwear-related emojis by the considerable grip on the sole of the shoe.

title: 🥡 Takeout Box
description: A tall, folded, paper carton, usually white, as used for takeout/takeaway food at Western Chinese restaurants. Most platforms depict chopsticks inside its open lid, labeled with a red, multi-tiered, traditional Chinese building. Also called an oyster pail.

title: ⛩️ Shinto Shrine
description: A shrine used for the Japanese Shinto religion. This emoji generally displays the torii, which is the gate to the Shinto Shrine. The torii is generally a red colored structure, with a curved roof section above two posts.

title: 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Family: Man, Woman, Girl, Boy
description: A family with a father, mother, daughter, and son.

title: 🐯 Tiger Face
