title: 🕧 Twelve-Thirty
description: Twelve-Thirty was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name “Clock Face Twelve-Thirty” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🌀 Cyclone
description: An icon used to represent a cyclone. Some versions of this emoji show a spiral shape, which may be used for decorative purposes.

title: 👅 Tongue
description: A tongue, sticking out. May be used as a childish sign of defiance.

title: 🇹🇱 Flag: Timor-Leste
description: The flag for East Timor, which may show as the letters TL on some platforms.

title: 🥵 Hot Face
description: A reddish-orange face with furrowed eyebrows, tongue stuck out, and beads of sweat, as if overheated from high temperatures. Number and position of sweat droplets vary by platforms. May also represent physical attractiveness (slang, hot).

title: 🤽‍♂️ Man Playing Water Polo
description: The Man Playing Water Polo emoji is a sequence of the 🤽 Water Polo and ♂ Male Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🤭 Face With Hand Over Mouth
description: A yellow face with a hand covering its mouth. Apple and Facebook feature simple, open eyes, suggesting someone gasping Oh my! in serious surprise, shock, concern, or apology. Other platforms depict a face with smiling eyes and/or blushing cheeks, suggesting coy laughter or embarrassment, as if cheekily saying Oops!

title: 🇬🇺 Flag: Guam
description: The flag for Guam, which may show as the letters GU on some platforms.

title: 🏄 Person Surfing
description: A person on a surfboard, riding on a wave in the ocean. Wears a wetsuit or board shorts in most versions.

title: 🇵🇾 Flag: Paraguay
description: The flag for Paraguay, which may show as the letters PY on some platforms.

title: ✔️ Heavy Check Mark
description: A thick (heavy) check mark displayed on some platforms in a handwritten style. Generally displayed in black on most platforms, except Android (blue), Windows (green) and Samsung (red).

title: 🇶🇦 Flag: Qatar
description: The flag for Qatar, which may show as the letters QA on some platforms.

title: 🦓 Zebra
description: Zebra was approved as part of Unicode 10.0 in 2017 under the name “Zebra Face” and added to Emoji 5.0 in 2017.

title: 🙎‍♀️ Woman Pouting
description: The female version of the 🙎 Person With Pouting Face emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.

title: 🗂️ Card Index Dividers
description: A set of tabbed dividers or file guides, as used to organize a card index or file box. Depicted with three or more multicolored tabs on manila paper.

title: 🧝‍♂️ Man Elf
description: The Man Elf emoji is a sequence of the 🧝 Elf and ♂ Male Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🇲🇸 Flag: Montserrat
description: The flag for Montserrat, which may show as the letters MS on some platforms.

title: 👨‍👦‍👦 Family: Man, Boy, Boy
description: The Family: Man, Boy, Boy emoji is a sequence of the 👨 Man, 👦 Boy and 👦 Boy emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🐟 Fish
description: A fish emoji, swimming in a non-tropical climate.

title: 🇦🇮 Flag: Anguilla
description: The flag for Anguilla, which may show as the letters AI on some platforms.

title: 🏇 Horse Racing
description: A jockey riding a horse in a horse race. Shown riding to the left of screen on all major platforms. Emoji modifiers change the skin tone of the jockey on some platforms, which can be difficult to discern at small sizes.

title: 🇲🇼 Flag: Malawi
description: The flag for Malawi, which may show as the letters MW on some platforms.

title: 🍍 Pineapple
description: The tropical fruit of a pineapple, shown in spiky, golden-brown skin and with a pointed, green crown. Positioned upright or at a 45° angle.

title: 🏌️ Person Golfing
description: A person swinging a golf club, attempting to hit a golf ball toward the flag on the green.

title: 👎 Thumbs Down
description: A thumbs-down gesture indicating disapproval.

title: 🚏 Bus Stop
description: A sign indicating the location of a bus stop by the side of a road.

title: 🌋 Volcano
description: A volcano, erupting with smoke and lava.

title: 🏄‍♂️ Man Surfing
description: The male version of the 🏄 Surfer emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.

title: 🕋 Kaaba
description: A cube-shaped building located at the centre of the Al-Masjid al-Haram Mosque in Mecca.

title: 🇰🇭 Flag: Cambodia
description: The flag for Cambodia, which may show as the letters KH on some platforms.

title: 🔽 Downwards Button
description: A triangle-shaped arrow, pointing down. Styled similarly to the left and right pointing triangles on iOS, but shown in red on Windows, and orange on Android.

title: 💵 Dollar Banknote
description: Cash money! A banded stack of U.S. dollar banknotes, the paper currency of the United States of America. Green hue and detail vary across platforms, but shown with the dollar sign, $. Commonly used for various content concerning wealth and money, not restricted to the U.S.

title: ⚛️ Atom Symbol
description: Atom Symbol was approved as part of Unicode 4.1 in 2005 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🐮 Cow Face
description: A friendly-looking cow face, looking straight ahead.

title: 🚺 Women’s Room
description: A stick-figure icon of a woman, generally used to indicate a female restroom. The male equivalent is the Mens Symbol emoji.

title: 🍆 Eggplant
description: A long, bulbous, bright purple eggplant, or aubergine in British English, shown with a leafy stem. Considered lucky in Japan to dream of an eggplant the first night of the New Year.

title: 🇸🇳 Flag: Senegal
description: The flag for Senegal, which may show as the letters SN on some platforms.

title: 🍾 Bottle With Popping Cork
description: A green bottle of champagne or sparkling wine with label, its cork popping to shoot out its bubbly contents. Used for a range of celebratory occasions, such as New Year's Eve, birthdays, weddings, or other life accomplishments.

title: 😉 Winking Face
description: A yellow face with a slight smile shown winking, usually its left eye. May signal a joke, flirtation, hidden meaning, or general positivity. Tone varies, including playful, affectionate, suggestive, or ironic.

title: 🍅 Tomato
description: A plump, red garden tomato topped with a leafy green stem. May resemble the red apple at small sizes.

title: 🛍️ Shopping Bags
description: Two colorful shopping bags, as contain consumer items bought at a department store. Depicted as gift bags in various bright colors, patterns, sizes, and positions across platforms. Apple's design, for instance, features a pink bag with light-pink dots in front of a gold bag with yellow stripes.

title: 🇬🇼 Flag: Guinea-Bissau
description: The flag for Guinea-Bissau, which may show as the letters GW on some platforms.

title: 🈂️ Japanese “Service Charge” Button
description: Translates as meaning complimentary, or free of charge. For example, a drink that is given "on the house" to a regular customer.

title: 🇵🇰 Flag: Pakistan
description: The flag for Pakistan, which may show as the letters PK on some platforms.

title: 🎍 Pine Decoration
description: A green decoration known as kadomatsu (門松, "gate pine") in Japanese. Shows three bamboo shoots of grathered vertically with different heights for each. Pine or plastic is sometimes used in place of bamboo, and various decorative items may be found alongside the traditional straw mat.

title: 🤷 Person Shrugging
description: A person shrugging their shoulders to indicate a lack of knowledge about a particular topic, or a lack of care about the result of a situation.

title: 🧷 Safety Pin
description: A silver safety pin or clip, as used to fasten fabric. Generally shown clasped at a 45° angle, with its spring at the lower left.

title: 🇾🇹 Flag: Mayotte
description: The flag for Mayotte, which may show as the letters YT on some platforms.

title: 🇧🇴 Flag: Bolivia
description: The flag for Bolivia, which may show as the letters BO on some platforms.

title: 🇨🇬 Flag: Congo - Brazzaville
description: The Flag: Congo - Brazzaville emoji is a sequence of the 🇨 Regional Indicator Symbol Letter C and 🇬 Regional Indicator Symbol Letter G emojis. These display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🏔️ Snow-Capped Mountain
description: A mountain with snow resting at higher altitudes. Similar in appearance to the Mount Fuji emoji.

title: 🧮 Abacus
description: An abacus, an ancient tool used to count and calculate by moving beads. Depicted as a wooden frame with four or more rows or columns of variously positioned and colored beads.

title: 💯 Hundred Points
description: 100 emoji: the number one-hundred, written in red, underlined twice for emphasis.

title: 🏝️ Desert Island
description: Desert Island was approved as part of Unicode 7.0 in 2014 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 😼 Cat Face With Wry Smile
description: A cartoon cat variant of 😏 Smirking Face. Depicted as yellow on major platforms.

title: 🌨️ Cloud With Snow
description: A cloud with small snowflakes drifting from it.

title: 💰 Money Bag
description: A bag full of money. Depicted as a sack, usually tan, tied off and displaying a dollar sign. May be filled with coins, as most platforms show a rounded bag.

title: 👫 Woman and Man Holding Hands
description: A woman and man holding hands, most likely due to being in a relationship.

title: 🇿🇲 Flag: Zambia
description: The flag for Zambia, which may show as the letters ZM on some platforms.

title: 🖼️ Framed Picture
description: A framed picture of a painting or photograph, as displayed in a gallery or on a household wall. Vendors feature various scenes, though generally a lush, sunny landscape of hills and mountains, in a gold frame.

title: 🇮🇶 Flag: Iraq
description: The flag for Iraq, which may show as the letters IQ on some platforms.

title: 🏡 House With Garden
description: A suburban-looking house, with a tree, flower, or shrubs around it in the garden.

title: 📞 Telephone Receiver
description: The handset of a traditional telephone, with speaker and microphone. Generally depicted in black at a 45° angle.

title: 😮 Face With Open Mouth
description: A yellow face with small, open eyes and a large, round mouth, slack with surprise or shock, as if saying Wow! or Oh my! May convey such feelings as awe or disbelief, often milder or more ironic in tone than 😱 Face Screaming in Fear.

title: 🔬 Microscope
description: A microscope, as used in science laboratories to magnify small objects, such as cells or insects. Depicted as a compound opitical microscope with an adjustable eyepiece, lens, arm, and slide stage mounted on a base. Generally shown as metal with the viewing apparatus facing left.

title: 🇩🇴 Flag: Dominican Republic
description: The flag for Dominican Republic, which may show as the letters DO on some platforms.

title: ⭐ Star
description: A five-point star of pale-yellow color. Generally used for visual flair rather than astronomical purposes.

title: 🍬 Candy
description: A small piece of round, hard sugar candy, as handed out on Halloween, wrapped with two twists on its ends. Candy and wrapper color vary widely by platform. Facebook’s design resembles a classic, unwrapped red-and-white peppermint. May also be called sweets or lollies.

title: 💿 Optical Disk
description: A silver optical disc, as a CD or DVD, used to play music or movies before the rise of streaming technology. Commonly used to represent CDs, DVDs, Blu-rays, and related film and music content, especially albums.

title: ☺️ Smiling Face
description: A classic smiley. A yellow face with a modest smile, rosy cheeks, and soft, closed eyes. Many platforms, including Apple, feature relaxed eyebrows. Conveys a wide range of warm, positive feelings, including love, happiness, and gratitude.

title: 🕰️ Mantelpiece Clock
description: An antique-styled mantel clock with a flat base and rounded case, as made of wood and brass and placed above a fireplace.

title: 🇹🇫 Flag: French Southern Territories
description: The flag for French Southern Territories, which may show as the letters TF on some platforms.

title: 😚 Kissing Face With Closed Eyes
description: A yellow face with smiling eyes, rosy cheeks, and puckered lips giving a kiss. Commonly conveys sentiments of romantic love and affection. Several platforms, including Apple, feature the same eyes and cheeks as their ☺️ Smiling Face.

title: ♥️ Heart Suit
description: A heart symbol emoji, which is used in card games for the hearts suit. Generally shown in red, despite the name. Not to be confused with the black heart emoji.

title: 🏭 Factory
description: An industrial factory, with flue-gas stacks releasing exhaust into the air.

title: 🥃 Tumbler Glass
description: A short, flat glass, as used for brown liquors like whiskey or Scotch whisky. Apple and WhatsApp serve theirs neat, while other platforms include ice ("on the rocks"). Samsung's glass features the faint initials ONI, an apparent in-company easter egg.

title: ⬛ Black Large Square
description: Black Large Square was approved as part of Unicode 5.1 in 2008 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🧒 Child
description: A child with no gender specified. This may be used as a gender-inclusive alternative to the boy or girl emoji.

title: 🥖 Baguette Bread
description: The long, thin loaf of a baguette, with scoring on its golden-brown crust. A bread commonly associated with France.

title: ⛏️ Pick
description: A pickaxe, a tool with a curved spike for breaking up rocks in mining. Generally depicted with a metal head and wooden handle, positioned at a 45° angle with the head at the upper left.

title: 🇳🇿 Flag: New Zealand
description: The flag for New Zealand, which may show as the letters NZ on some platforms.

title: 🔌 Electric Plug
description: An electric plug, as inserted into socket to power a device. Depicted as a black, two-pronged plug at various angles at the end of a cable. Prongs are silver or gold.

title: ⚫ Black Circle
description: Black Circle was approved as part of Unicode 4.1 in 2005 under the name “Medium Black Circle” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🏋️‍♀️ Woman Lifting Weights
description: The female version of the 🏋 Weight Lifter emoji.

title: 🤯 Exploding Head
description: A yellow face with an open mouth, the top of its head exploding in the shape of a brain-like mushroom cloud. A visual form of the expression mind blown, it may represent such emotions as shock, awe, amazement, and disbelief.

title: 🐄 Cow
description: A cow with a black and white patched coat, likely a Holstein Freisan breed.

title: 🇨🇷 Flag: Costa Rica
description: The flag for Costa Rica, which may show as the letters CR on some platforms.

title: 🕐 One O’Clock
description: One O’Clock was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name “Clock Face One O’Clock” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🇪🇦 Flag: Ceuta & Melilla
description: The flag for Ceuta, Melilla, which may show as the letters EA on some platforms. Uses the same flag as Spain.

title: 💇‍♀️ Woman Getting Haircut
description: The female version of the 💇 Haircut emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.

title: 🤼 People Wrestling
description: Two people in the sport of wrestling.

title: 🚥 Horizontal Traffic Light
description: A set of red, orange (amber) and green traffic lights, used at intersections. Less common than the vertical traffic light.

title: 🧩 Jigsaw
description: Jigsaw was approved as part of Unicode 11.0 in 2018 under the name “Jigsaw Puzzle Piece” and added to Emoji 11.0 in 2018.

title: 🔯 Dotted Six-Pointed Star
description: A star with six points, and a dot in the center. Similar to the Star of David emoji.

title: 🇧🇧 Flag: Barbados
description: The flag for Barbados, which may show as the letters BB on some platforms.

title: 💃 Woman Dancing
description: A person dancing, most commonly displayed as woman with one arm raised wearing a red dress, while dancing the salsa or flamenco. Often used to represent a sense of fun or as a positive affirmation, e.g. "great! 💃"

title: 🤕 Face With Head-Bandage
description: A yellow face with a half-frown and white bandage wrapped around its head, often depicted partially over one eye. May represent physical injury or pain but also emotional hurting, sometimes for ironic effect.

title: 🗾 Map of Japan
description: Shows a map of the country of Japan, which is the only country to have its own emoji map. Other countries can be found on the various globe emojis, or the world map emoji.

title: 🥤 Cup With Straw
description: A drinking cup with a straw. Depicted on many platforms as a disposable cup with a lid and bendy straw, as used to serve soft drinks at fast-food restaurants. May be used for a range of non-alcoholic beverages, including milkshakes, smoothies, juice, and to-go beverages.

title: 🐃 Water Buffalo
description: A Domestic Water Buffalo, used primarily for tilling (ploughing) rice fields in parts of Asia.

title: 🔡 Input Latin Lowercase
description: A symbol showing the lowercase letters a, b, c and d. Intended to be used on a software keyboard, or other input screen to toggle lowercase letter input.

title: ㊙️ Japanese “Secret” Button
description: Japanese “Secret” Button was approved as part of Unicode 1.1 in 1993 under the name “Circled Ideograph Secret” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🥼 Lab Coat
description: A white coat worn in a science laboratory.

title: 🍈 Melon
description: A melon fruit in a light greenish-brown rind. Depicted as a cantaloupe by most platforms, but can resemble a honeydew at a distance.

title: 🛋️ Couch and Lamp
description: A couch (sofa) with a floor lamp on the right, as in the living room of a house. Color and style of the couch and lamp vary widely by platform. Used for various content concerning furniture and housing as well as resting and lounging.

title: 🧶 Yarn
description: A ball of yarn, as used to knit a scarf. Color varies across platforms, but often depicted in green, blue, or magenta and shown with an end unraveling. Sometimes depicted with a pair of knitting needles stuck in the ball.

title: ✏️ Pencil
description: A classic yellow pencil. Depicted as a graphite pencil, like a U.S. #2 or European HB, with a sharpened tip and pink eraser. Positioned at a 45° angle, with its tip at the lower left or right. Commonly used for various content concerning writing, drawing, and schooling.

title: 🎹 Musical Keyboard
description: A small section of a music keyboard, which differs from a computer keyboard.

title: ⌨️ Keyboard
description: A keyboard, as used to type on a computer. Generally depicted as a gray device with white or black keys. Used for various content concerning computers, typing, and writing.

title: 🕤 Nine-Thirty
description: Nine-Thirty was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name “Clock Face Nine-Thirty” and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: ⏳ Hourglass Not Done
description: A classic hourglass, its sand still flowing from the top to bottom bulb. Indicates time is still passing—but life is short. Color varies across platforms.

title: 🧓 Older Person
description: An older adult with no gender specified. This may be used as a gender-inclusive alternative to the older man or older woman emoji.

title: 📦 Package
description: A package (parcel), as contains items ordered online. Depicted at various angles as a light-brown, cardboard box, with a shipping label and its top taped shut.

title: ❇️ Sparkle
description: Used a decorative bullet-point, the sparkle has both a ❇︎ text and ❇️ emoji presentation available on most platforms.

title: 🙀 Weary Cat Face
description: A cartoon cat variant of 😩 Weary Face. Its expression more closely resembles 😱 Face Screaming in Fear. Depicted as yellow on major platforms.

title: 😫 Tired Face
description: A yellow face with scrunched, X-shaped eyes, furrowed eyebrows, and a broad, open frown, as if yawning in exhaustion or groaning in exasperation. Usually shown with upper teeth and sometimes tongue.

title: 🧝 Elf
description: Creatures with pointed ears and human-like faces. Female and male elves are available.

title: 🏞️ National Park
description: A national park, generally displayed with mountains, a river or stream, and trees.

title: 🏃‍♂️ Man Running
description: The male version of the 🏃 Runner emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.

title: 🐏 Ram
description: A male sheep, known as a ram, with spiralled horns.

title: 🇰🇼 Flag: Kuwait
description: The flag for Kuwait, which may show as the letters KW on some platforms.

title: 👩‍👩‍👦 Family: Woman, Woman, Boy
description: A family with two mothers, and one son.

title: 🏖️ Beach With Umbrella
description: A beach showing sand, and an umbrella for protection from the sun.

title: 🇰🇲 Flag: Comoros
description: The flag for Comoros, which may show as the letters KM on some platforms.

title: 👩 Woman
description: A woman of adult age. Differentiated from the girl emoji by the lack of pig-tails in her hair.

title: 💠 Diamond With a Dot
description: A glyph that is used for kawaii in Japan, resembling the shape of a flower.

title: 🇬🇱 Flag: Greenland
description: The flag for Greenland, which may show as the letters GL on some platforms.

title: 🥁 Drum
description: A drum shown with drumsticks. A percussion instrument which is likely to be displayed as a snare drum.

title: 🇳🇱 Flag: Netherlands
description: The flag for Netherlands, which may show as the letters NL on some platforms.

title: 🇻🇦 Flag: Vatican City
description: The flag for Vatican City, which may show as the letters VA on some platforms.

title: 📟 Pager
description: A pager, as worn on the waist to alert a person to a phone call or short text message. Popular in the 1980–90s before mobile phones, though still used by some medical and emergency personnel. Very occasionally used to represent alerts, digital communication, or nostalgia for old technology.

title: 👩‍👧‍👦 Family: Woman, Girl, Boy
description: The Family: Woman, Girl, Boy emoji is a sequence of the 👩 Woman, 👧 Girl and 👦 Boy emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🇯🇪 Flag: Jersey
description: The flag for Jersey, which may show as the letters JE on some platforms.

title: 👴 Old Man
description: An elderly man gray (grey) hair, and visible wrinkles. Balding in many versions of this artwork, such as Apple and Microsoft designs.

title: 🥕 Carrot
description: A whole, bright orange carrot, topped with long green leaves, as if freshly plucked from the garden. Some platforms feature a longer, thinner carrot, others a shorter, more bulbous one.

title: 👳‍♂️ Man Wearing Turban
description: The male version of the 👳‍♀️ Woman Wearing Turban emoji.

title: 🏵️ Rosette
description: A round flower decoration, in a similar shape to a flower blossom. May be found used on ancient sculptures, as well as modern military awards.

title: 🇫🇷 Flag: France
description: The flag for France, which may show as the letters FR on some platforms.

title: 🦈 Shark
description: A shark swimming in the ocean, often displayed with a blue or gray tone.

title: 🚫 Prohibited
description: Called a “No Entry” sign Emoji, but does not look like the no entry road sign that one might expect.

title: 😽 Kissing Cat Face
description: A cartoon cat variant of 😚 Kissing Face With Closed Eyes. Depicted as yellow on major platforms.

title: 🌻 Sunflower
description: A sunflower emoji. Bright and yellow. Give it to someone to make them smile!

title: 🦙 Llama
description: A llama facing right-to-left with a white or light brown fur. May also be used as an Alpaca.

title: 🍙 Rice Ball
description: A Japanese onigiri, a cone-shaped ball of white rice, a snack wrapped with a sheet of nori, or seaweed.

title: 🐱 Cat Face
description: The face of a cat, looking directly forward. Shown as yellow or gray on most platforms, this emoji generally has a cartoon-style appearance and visible whiskers.

title: 🇲🇱 Flag: Mali
description: The flag for Mali, which may show as the letters ML on some platforms.

title: 🚪 Door
description: A door, as to the entrance of a room, house, or new opportunity. (We’ll see ourselves out 🚪🚶.) Depicted in brown, as made of wood, with a gold handle.

title: 🇩🇯 Flag: Djibouti
description: The flag for Djibouti, which may show as the letters DJ on some platforms.

title: 🇬🇧 Flag: United Kingdom
description: The flag for the United Kingdom of Great Britain, which may show as the letters GB on some platforms.

title: 🚮 Litter in Bin Sign
description: A symbol showing a person putting litter (rubbish) in the trash (rubbish bin). A more positive version of the Do Not Litter Symbol.

title: 🐍 Snake
description: A green, coiled snake sticking out its forked tongue.

title: 🇲🇭 Flag: Marshall Islands
description: The flag for Marshall Islands, which may show as the letters MH on some platforms.

title: 🤦 Person Facepalming
description: A hand shown pressing against the head of a person, commonly written as facepalm. Used to display frustration or embarrassment at the ineptitude of a person or situation.

title: 🦡 Badger
description: Badger was approved as part of Unicode 11.0 in 2018 and added to Emoji 11.0 in 2018.

title: 💺 Seat
description: A seat, which could refer to any form of place to sit, with the distinction that a seat is generally fixed, and is not a chair which can be moved.

title: 🚗 Automobile
description: A car shown from the side, facing right-to-left. Appears as a red car on most platforms (which goes faster), except on Android where this displays as a silver car (previously blue).

title: 👨‍👧 Family: Man, Girl
description: The Family: Man, Girl emoji is a sequence of the 👨 Man and 👧 Girl emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🚛 Articulated Lorry
description: Articulated Lorry was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: ⛑️ Rescue Worker’s Helmet
description: A construction helmet, which is worn by the construction worker emoji in some emoji sets.

title: 🚣‍♂️ Man Rowing Boat
description: The male version of the 🚣 Rowboat emoji. Currently identical in appearance to the non-gendered base emoji.

title: 👨‍🌾 Man Farmer
description: The Man Farmer emoji is a sequence of the 👨 Man and 🌾 Ear of Rice emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: ♣️ Club Suit
description: A club symbol emoji, which is used in card games for the clubs suit.

title: 👈 Backhand Index Pointing Left
description: Index finger pointing to the left.

title: 🇸🇯 Flag: Svalbard & Jan Mayen
description: The flag for Svalbard & Jan Mayen, which may show as the letters SJ on some platforms. This is the same flag as Norway.

title: 🧛‍♂️ Man Vampire
description: The Man Vampire emoji is a sequence of the 🧛 Vampire and ♂ Male Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🍑 Peach
description: The fleshy, pinkish-orange fruit of the fuzzy peach, shown with green leaves and sometimes a stem.

title: 🐘 Elephant
description: A large elephant, found in parts of Africa and Asia. Displayed facing left-to-right on all platforms. Some versions display tusks. Samsung previously showed a heart emitting from the trunk.

title: 🦠 Microbe
description: Microbe was approved as part of Unicode 11.0 in 2018 and added to Emoji 11.0 in 2018.

title: 🕳️ Hole
description: A round, black, cartoon-styled hole, as a manhole or a hole (cup) in golf. May be used to represent various types of literal or figurative holes, e.g., black holes, rabbit holes.

title: 🐽 Pig Nose
description: A pig’s snout / nose.

title: 🚄 High-Speed Train
description: A high speed train, designed to cover long distances at high speed.

title: ☠️ Skull and Crossbones
description: A cartoon human skull atop an X-shaped pair of bones, as on a pirate flag or poison symbol. Samsung’s design previously displayed a skull and crossbones on a yellow triangle, indicating a hazardous material.

title: 🇻🇮 Flag: U.S. Virgin Islands
description: The flag for US Virgin Islands, which may show as the letters VI on some platforms.

title: ⤴️ Right Arrow Curving Up
description: A curved arrow pointing up.

title: 📼 Videocassette
description: A videotape cassette, as a VHS tape used to watch movies or record TV on VCRs before DVDs , DVRs, and streaming. Generally depicted as a black cassette with a white label between its reels.

title: 📋 Clipboard
description: A white piece of paper secured by a silver clip on a brown clipboard, as used as a writing surface when standing. Commonly used for content concerning various types of documents and writing, especially in sports.

title: 🤦‍♀️ Woman Facepalming
description: The Woman Facepalming emoji is a sequence of the 🤦 Face Palm and ♀ Female Sign emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each character and display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🌮 Taco
description: A Mexican or Tex-Mex taco on a hard or soft corn tortilla, filled with such ingredients as beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese, and onion. Apple’s design resembles a carne asada taco, with cilantro and white onion.

title: 😗 Kissing Face
description: A yellow face with simple, open eyes and puckered lips giving a kiss. Commonly conveys sentiments of love and affection.

title: 🦊 Fox Face
description: A fox face, shown with pointy ears. At small sizes may be difficult to discern from a wolf face. Also available as an Animoji on iOS.

title: 0️⃣ Keycap Digit Zero
description: The Keycap Digit Zero emoji is a sequence of the 0 Digit Zero and ⃣ Combining Enclosing Keycap emojis. These display as a single emoji on supported platforms.

title: 🙅 Person Gesturing No
description: A person with arms crossed forming an ‘X’ to indicate ‘no’ or ‘no good’. This motion is used on the TV game show Deal or No Deal to indicate ‘No Deal’. Intended to be gender-neutral but shown as a woman on most platforms.

title: 🔀 Shuffle Tracks Button
description: Two arrows pointing right while crossing over one another. Used to indicate putting music on shuffle: randomizing the order of tracks in the upcoming playlist. May also be used to indicate two items switching places.

title: 🛌 Person in Bed
description: A bed with a gender-unspecified person sleeping in it, as at a house, hotel, hostel, or other sleeping accommodation. Used especially for various content concerning sleeping as well as beds, furniture, housing, relaxing, and other bedroom activities.

title: ➕ Heavy Plus Sign
description: Heavy Plus Sign was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015.

title: 🤬 Face With Symbols on Mouth
description: An angry-red face with a black bar and white grawlixes covering its mouth, indicating it's swearing or being vulgar. Grawlixes are typographical symbols (e.g., @#$%&!) representing swear words or obscenities. Often used to convey an outburst of anger, frustration, or rage.
